description: ክብረ ክህነት ስለ ክህነትና ካህናት ስለንሰሐ ልጅ ስለ ኑዛዜና ቀኖና ስለ ክህነት ክብር ዝርዝር ማብራሪያን የሚሰጥ መጽሐፍ ነው። ይህን እሳት ያለ ጉጠት የሚዳሥ ካህን እንዴት ያለ ነው...? ስልጣነ ክህነት በሐዲስ ኪዳን ምን ይመስላል የንስሐ አባትና የንሰሐ ልጅ ስለሚኖራቸው ድርሻና ሓላፊነት ቀኖናና መንፈሳዊ ሥርዓቱን ምን እንደሚመስል እና መንፈሳዊ ህይወት ለምዕመናን ያለውን ፋይዳ የሚያሳይ መጽሐፍ ባጠቃላይ በሚስጥራተ በቤተ ክርስቲያን ውስጥ ሰፊ ድርሻ ያለውን ክብረ ክህነት ለካህናት እና ለምዕመናን ለማሳወቅ እና ሌሎች ትምህርቶችንም

title: ዜሮ ሰዓት ፩
author: ዙምራ (ይጽየሀ)
description: Housing is a major contributor to CO2 emissions in Europe and America today and the construction of new homes offers an opportunity to address this issue. Providing homes that achieve "zero carbon", "carbon neutral", "zero-net energy" or "energy-plus" standard is becoming the goal of more innovative house-builders globally, whilst energy providers seek to decarbonise the energy supply to new and existing development. Various new technical systems for achieving these goals are beginning to emerge. For example the passive house whose energy requirement for space heating and cooling is almost zero; the smart grid that has revolutionized the management of energy, whilst enabling the connection of small-scale, renewable energy producers and electric vehicles to the grid; or the European super-grid which will enable zero carbon energy to be generated in the Sahara desert and stored in Norway. This book explores the diverse approaches that are being adopted around the world to deliver zero carbon homes and the different societal systems and geographic circumstances in which they have developed. It postulates a roadmap for delivering zero carbon homes, together with a toolbox approach for policy and practice to suit particular national and local circumstances. A series of case studies are presented that offer lessons for delivering zero carbon homes. These examples are also used to demonstrate how prototype systems can move into the mainstream. The book highlights some of the instruments and mechanisms that could be used to support this transformation and addresses the wider implications of introducing these innovative systems in terms of industry, lifestyle and urban form.

author: ዳቪድ ቮን ቫን
description: Contemporary Literary and Cultural Theory: The Johns Hopkins Guide is a clear, accessible, and detailed overview of the most important thinkers and topics in the field. Written by specialists from across disciplines, its entries cover contemporary theory from Adorno to ?i?ek, providing an informative and reliable introduction to a vast, challenging area of inquiry. Materials include newly commissioned articles along with essays drawn from The Johns Hopkins Guide to Literary Theory and Criticism, known as the definitive resource for students and scholars of literary theory and for philosophical reflection on literature and culture.

title: GODAANNISA
author: ድሀአባአ ዋይየስሳ
description: The purpose of this study is to analyze how a narrative voice is manifested in two Oromo narratives: Godaannisa and Gurraacha Abbayyaa, written by Dhaba Woyyessa. The intention is to show how an author applies different styles from text to text in terms of narrative voice. It is also attempted to indicate that the application of voice in a narrative can be analyzed not only irrespective of the medium but also irrespective of the language in which the narrative is presented. When analyzed critically, as Genette (1980), Booth (1983), Phelan (1996) and Bal (1997) among others would argue, a narrative voice can help to understand the characteristics of a certain text. So to analyze the narrative voice in each selected narrative, source, level, text and time relationship, and degrees of conspicuousness and reliability of the narrator are used as criteria. The study revealed that the narrative voice in Godaannisa is a personified, extra-homodiegetic, overt, retrospective and unreliable while the narrative voice in Gurraacha Abbayyaa is unpersonified, extra-hetrodiegetic, moderately overt, retrospective and slightly unreliable.

title: ኦፕሬሽን ሰለሞን ያልተነገረው ምስጢር
author: ስተጰን ስተጭከል
description: "Operation Solomon" was one of the most remarkable rescue efforts in modern history, in which more than 14,000 Ethiopian Jews were airlifted to Israel in little more than a day. In this riveting volume, Stephen Spector offers the definitive account of this incredible story, based on over 200 interviews and exclusive access to confidential documents. Written with the pace and immediacy of a novel, here is the dramatic story of the rescue of the dark-skinned Jews of Ethiopia. Spector recounts how 20,000 Jews were willingly lured from their ancestral villages to Addis Ababa, expecting to be taken quickly from there to the Holy Land. Instead, they became pawns in a struggle between the Israeli government and Ethiopia's repressive dictator, who tried to coerce Israel into selling him weapons he needed in a losing war against rebel armies. In the resulting stalemate, the Jewish community was forced to live for nearly a year in squalid hovels, vulnerable to the dangers of the city, including crime and HIV. Worse yet, the imminent collapse of Addis Ababa, with the rebels closing in on the capital, raised the threat of bloody street fighting or even a genocidal attack on the Jews, a small minority in a nation that is primarily Christian and Muslim. Spector describes the tense negotiations among Israelis, Ethiopians, and Americans, which became increasingly urgent as time ran low and the danger mounted. And he highlights the secret deals and sudden setbacks that nearly aborted the mission at the eleventh hour, even as Israeli jets sat on the runway in Ethiopia, waiting to take the Jews to the land for which they had yearned for generations. Recounting the full story for the first time, Operation Solomon is a stirring account of a heroic rescue achieved in the face of daunting odds.

title: Assessment
author: መመሄር ሲሳይ ወጋየሁ
description: Classroom Assessment: Concepts and Applications views classroom assessment as an everyday, ongoing part of teaching, integral to everything that happens in the classroom. The text is organized to follow the natural progression of teacher decision making, from organizing the class as a learning community to planning and conducting instruction to the formal evaluation of learning and, finally, to grading. Classroom Assessment presents complex concepts clearly so that pre-service teachers can understand them, and solidly grounds these concepts in best practice through practical, well-integrated examples. The text conceives of classroom assessment in a broader way than many other texts. It focuses not only on the assessment needs of testing, grading, interpreting standardized tests, and performance assessments but also on assessment concerns in organizing a classroom at the start of school, planning and implementing instruction, and strategies of teacher self reflection.

title: ETHIOPIAN REVIEW OF CULTURES (6) A MODERN AND CONTEMPORARY HISTORY OF THE CATHOLIC CHURCH IN ETHIOPIA (16th-20th CENTURIES)
title_en: ETHIOPIAN REVIEW OF CULTURES (6) A MODERN AND CONTEMPORARY HISTORY OF THE CATHOLIC CHURCH IN ETHIOPIA (16th-20th CENTURIES)
title_romanized: ETHIOPIAN REVIEW OF CULTURES (6) A MODERN AND CONTEMPORARY HISTORY OF THE CATHOLIC CHURCH IN ETHIOPIA (16th-20th CENTURIES)
author: ድር.አብባአብቶኒኦስ አልበርቶ, ኦፍምጫፕ
description: PREFACE Since my childhood, I have had a great interest in knowing the history of Ethiopia in general, and the history of the Catholic Church in Ethiopia in particular. In the first volume of the Ethiopian Review of Cultures entitled, The Apostolic Vicariate of Oromo, A Capuchin Mission in Ethiopia (184 INTRODUCTION It is always interesting to know more about one's country and one's religious background. This is why I have been motivated to briefly prese the Modern and Contemporary History of the Catholic Church in Ethiopia which covers the period of history between is" and zo" centuries. In my book, I have tried to present not only the religious history but also the over all socio-political situation of Ethiopia throughout its long history. This book is divided into four chapters. The first chapter deals with the over-all socio-political and religious history of Ethiopia from the early Christian era until the zo" century. In this chapter, various Catholic missionary efforts in Ethiopia, particularly between the 16th and 20th centuries, have been elaborated upon. The second chapter of this book deals with various activities of Msgr. Andre Jarosseau, who was one of the most prominent figures of the history of the Catholic Church in Ethiopia and one who endeavored to do a lot for the expansion and the consolidation of the Catholic Church throughout Ethiopia during the first four decades of the 20th century. The figure of Msgr. Pascal Luchon, who was the Apostolic Prefect of Djibouti and the founder of the Catholic Missions in the Region of the Great Lakes, namely, Gural Kambata-Hadiya and Wolayta, is also highlighted. The third chapter of this book deals with the epoch of the Italian Occupation of Ethiopia, whereby many Italian missionaries, prominently Capuchin missionaries, were sent to promote the Catholic mission in Ethiopia. In this chapter, I have also highlighted the restructuring of the Catholic Ecclesiastical Jurisdictions in the country. The fourth chapter of this book deals with the difficult situation that the serving in the Catholic missions in Ethiopia found themselves in at the end of the Italian Occupation of Ethiopia. The role of Msgr. Castelfani, the Apostolic Delegate of Ethiopia and Apostolic Vicar of Addis Ababa, who tried his best with his vigorious diplomatic activities with the Ethiopia Govermnent and British Military Authorities to save at least some Italiannmissionanes and nuns from being evacuated from Ethiopia is also well described. In this chapter, Msgr. Castellani's efforts to invite Ethiopian priests from Eritrea as well as non-Italian missionaries from other countries is also detailed. Here, the role of Msgr. Kidanemariam Kasa, Bishop of Asmara and Regent Apostolic Delegate of Ethiopia, has also been presented.  This chapter also deals with the coming of Msgr. Theodore Monnens,Special Envoy of the Holy See to Ethiopia, and the Episcopal nomination of Msgr. Hailemariam Kahsay, Exarch of Addis Ababa (later Eparch of Adigrat). and Msgr. Jacob Gebreyesus, Bishop of Asmara.   The fifth chapter of this book deals with the coming of the Capuchin missionaries of Paris. The prominent figure of Msgr. Person, Vicar Apostolic of Harar and Apostolic Administrator of the whole of the Latin Rite territory of Ethiopia, and also his companion Capuchin missionaries are well described. The role of Msgr. Person, who succeeded in interesting various groups of religious congregations to enter Ethiopia as missionaries and contributed to the Catholic evangelization endeavors in the country, is also highlighted in this chapter.   The major unpublished sources of this book are primarily documents from: the General Archives of the Capuchin Order in Rome and the Archives of the Capuchin Provinces of Torino, Genova, Trento, Parma, Rome, Venice, and Paris.   For the presentation of this book, I have applied an historic and objective descriptive method based on first-hand documents from credible ecclesiastical archives in Ethiopia and in Europe.   The novelty of this book is its bringing to light together the rrussionary efforts of various religious congregations which have tried their best to collaborate for the common objectives of evangelization of those who were socio-welfare and pastoral activities, to also promote peace, justice and wholistic human development among the Ethiopians.

title: የፍርደኛው ጥብቅ ምስጢራት (ከ1986-2010 ዓ.ም)
author: ጸጋየ ዮሀንነስ

title: Food Preparation
author: ታዪቱ አሊ
description: Introduction In order to be delicious, a food must be cooked well and served attractively. The methods of cooking and serving food, not only influence the flavour, colour and texture, but also the nutritive value. Unpleasant flavours and colours sometimes are developed because of keeping the foods in a warm oven, or on a hot plate. Therefore, it is good to serve food immediately after it is cooked. The book classifies the culinary work into three basic activities: larder, kitchen-store and pastry. Each of these activities is sub- divided in accordance with the size, type, class and work load of the catering unit. This book mainly contains three courses: Hot kitchen deals with various preparations including traditional preparation and recipes from different countries. Cold kitchen concerned with cold preparations including butchering, dress poultry, preparing first courses, salad, sandwiches and dessert preparation, drying and processing of various food items and Pastry gives a brief knowledge and skill in preparation of pastry items to help trainees gain ideas on baking pastry and traditional bread making. The book puts the recipes and also the content in line with the curriculum guide design for the middle level technical-Vocational training program.

title: ኢትዮጵያ ሆይ  ቅጽ  1

author: ስቾላርስ ኦፍ እትሂኦፒአን ኦርትሆዶጥ ቹርች

title: ጓድ ሊቀመንበር መንግሥቱ ኃይለ ማርያም የጊ.ወ.አ. ደርግና የኢሠፓአኮ ሊቀመንበር የአብዮታዊ ጦር ጠቅላይ አዛዥ ለኢሕድሪ ብሔራዊ ሸንጎ የመጀመርያ አስቸኩኣይ ጉባዔ ያቀረቡት  ሪፖርት

title: የትንሻን ልጅ ጥርስ ማን ወሰደው፧

description: A story about a little girl that pulled out  a tooth, and throws it on the roof of her house. The intended recipient is a bird but it ends up in the wrong hands and the anxious girl goes searching for it.

title: ሳባውያን
author: የአብጸጋ አምባው
description: New Amharic Fiction eBook by Yeabtsega Ambaw. ሳባውያን የተሰኘው የደራሲ የአብፀጋ አምባው አዲስ መጽሐፍ በ digital eBook እነሆ ተብላችኋል። መልክማ ንባብ!

title: መንትዮቹ ደስታን ፍለጋ ቁጥር 5
author: የአብጸጋ አምባው
description: የደስታን ፍለጋ ትረካ የመጨረሻው ክፍል ሲሆን አንድ ዛር ከአንዲት ሴት ፍቅር ይይዘውና ባሏን እየተዋረሰ ይገናኛታል።

title: አንድ ቀን
author: ኪሩበል ኩማ
description: የኪሩቤል ኩማ አንድ ቀን የተሰኘውን አዲስ የግጥም መድብል እነሆ በ ሶፍት ኮፒ ከ Ethio Book Review. Read, Review and Share.

title: ሚስጥራዊ ማስታወሻዎች(ደስታን ፍለጋ ቁ.4)
author: የአብጸጋ አምባው
description: The author wishes to clarify that while the logic, psychology, occult theory, and narratives presented in this book are entirely genuine, they are also wholly products of creative imagination. Some of the creatures depicted in this book are fictional, whereas others are believed to exist in certain regions of Ethiopia.

title: Trading Basics in Amharic
author: ናትሀኒም አንዷለም
description: This book not only teaches you about forex trading it teaches you more about the market and how it works. I recommend reading it.

title: ዳሎጵያ
author: ሲሳይ መኳነንት
description: In an effort to find a world named "Dallopia," this story explores space travel and tells the tale of the Dallopians trying to control the powers worshiped by their creatures. It covers science, spying, politics, religion, Ethiopia's future, and the world's journey. So, let's dive into the reading! You're encouraged to read it carefully!

title: ፍጡራኑ (The Creatures)
author: ሲሳይ መኳነንት
description: An excellent introduction under the title "ፍጡራኑ" (THE CREATURES) for the general reader about the place called AFAR. Lucidly and fluently written, Sisay's deep and humane understanding and wide reading across history and literature shine through on every page. A compelling, engaging and short book aimed at all who are interested in understanding the roots and complexities of nature in Afar (Dalol) region of Ethiopia. Dr. Mehari Fisseha (Dr. Mehari Fisseha is an international intellectual person with different PHDs, MA degrees and BA.)

title: ሚስጥራዊ ሚስት(ደስታን ፍለጋ ቁ.3)
author: የአብጸጋ አምባው
description: ዕሙ ከጠፋች ሁለተኛ ቀኑን ያዘ ። እንደቀልድ ደብዛዋ ጠፋ ። ብንፈልግ ብናስፈልግ አየናት የሚል ጠፋ ። በአጋጣሚ መንገድ ላይ ከኦክሲ ጋር ስንገናኝ ፈገግ ትልልኛለች ። ፈገግታዋን ሲያይ ልቤ ጥፍት ይልላት ጀመር ። እንደው አንድ ቀን ሰው በሌለበት ባገኘሗት እል ጀመር ። ምን እንደነካኝ እንጃ ሁለመናዬ ኦክሲን ኦክሲን ይለኛል ። ስለሷ ሳስብ ልቤ አከባቢ ይነዝረኛል ። የኔ ውድ ኦክሲ የደም ዝውውሬን ሁላ ተቆጣጥራዋለች ። የምር ይሔን ያልኩት እኔ ነኝ !? ምን ሆኜ ነው ግን ? የንጉሥ ሚስትን መመኘት ታላቅ ድፍረት ቢሆንም እኔ ግን ከመመኘት አልፎ ለመቃመስ አቀድኩ ። ይሔ ደግሞ በራስ ላይ ሞት እንደመፍረድ ነው ። ከተጋደምኩበት እንደምንም እየተንጠራራሁ ተነሳሁ ። ቀኑን ሙሉ በማላውቀው ምክንያት ደብሮኝ ተኝቼ ነው የዋልኩት። ጫማዬን ተጫምቼ ወደ በሩ አመራሁ። እየመሸ ስለነበር ድንግዝግዝ ያለ ብርሀን ነው የሚታየኝ ። በሩን ከፍቼ ወጣሁ ። ቤተ መንግስቱ ያለወትሮው ፀጥታ ሰፍኖታል ። ሽርጉድ የሚያበዙትን ሰራተኞችን እንኳን ዛሬ ላያቸው አልቻልኹም ። ድንገት ከኮሪደሩ ጫፍ ላይ የሆነ ሰው ብቅ አለ። ከርቀት መለየት የቻልኩት ነጭ ልብስ እንደለበሰ ብቻ ነው ። ትንሽ ቆይቶ ያው ሰው ቀኝ እጁን አንስቶ አውለበለበልኝ ። የሰውዬውን አቅጣጫ ተከትዬ መራመድ ጀመርኩ ። ወደሰውዬው እየቀረብኩ ስመጣ ቀሚስ የለበሰች ሴት መሆኗን እየለየሁ መጣሁ። አዎን ኦክሲ ናት ። የኔ ኦክሲ ፊቷ ላይ የሆነ ነገር እንዳማራት ይናገራል ። ደሞ ያንን ፈገግታዋን አብርታዋለች ። ቀስ እያልኩ ወዳለችበት ተጠጋሁ ። ድንግዝግዝ ባለው ብርሀንም ቢሆን ውበቷን ለማስተዋል አይከብድም ። አጠገቧ ልደርስ ስል እጥፍ አለችና ከዓይኔ ተሰወረች ። ምንድነው ጉዱ ? በህልሜ ነው እንዴ !? ህልም ከሆነ እንድነቃ በማሰብ ሀሳቤን ሰብስቤ ትኩረቴን ንቃት ላይ አደረኩ ። ግን ምንም የተፈጠረ ነገር የለም ። ያለወትሮው የቤተ መንግስቱ መብራት አለመብራቱ እንግዳ ስሜት ፈጠረብኝ ። በቁም እየቃዠሁ ነው ? ተራመድኩና ኦክሲ ወደታጠፈችበት አቅጣጫ ተመለከትኩ ። መታጠፊያው አጠገብ ግድግዳውን ታካ ቆማለች ። የምሽቱ ንፋስ ፀጉሯን እያዘናፈለ ያጫውተው ጀምሯል ። ከንፈሯን በምላሷ እያረጠበች በስስት ተመለከተችኝ ።

title: ሚስጥራዊው ዓለም (ደስታን ፍለጋ ቁ.2)
author: የአብጸጋ አምባው
description: በጣም ነው የተበሳጨሁት ። አልሚሪስ እስከ ሙታን ዓለም ድረስ ተከታትሎ ያቺን የዛር ውላጅ ይበቀላታል ብዬ አስቤ ነበር ። ታተይ ግን ስታሳዝን በታምሪያ የበቀል ጥም ምክንያት ዘላለማዊ ስቃይ ነው የምትሰቃዬው። ታንዛን ግን አጥፍቷል የጋኔል ጦርን መጥራት አልነበረበትም። ለዚህ ጥፋቱም የሚስጥራዊው ዓለም ጠባቂዎች እንደሚቀጡት አልጠራጠርም።

title: ከሌብነት ወደ ባልነት
author: ዘሪሁን ገመቹ
description: አባት ልሆን ነው፡፡ ባለቤቴ መፀነሷን ዛሬ ነው የነገረችኝ፤ ዛሬ ከሶስት ሰዓት በፊት ፡፡ የደስታዬ መጠኑን እንዴት ላስረዳቸሁ እችላለሁ?፡፡ ደስታ በምን ዓይነት መለኪያ ይለካ ይሆን..? በሜትር አይለካ፤ በሚዛን አይመዘን፤ በሊትር አይሰፈር፤ እንዲሁ ብቻ በግምት የተትረፈረፈ እና የሚያሰክር ደስታ ውስጥ ነው ያለሁት ብዬ ከነገርኳችሁ ይበቃል፡፡

title: የገቢ ግብር አሰራር በኢትዮጵያ
author: አጽበሀ ተክሉ
description: Although this book is prepared from income tax decrees, regulations and guidelines, the writer is supported by examples for experts and taxpayers as well as the tax collector's staff for reference. It is an easy to use workbook. Although important and most of the laws are taken from the decree and regulations and guidelines, the author has prepared and selected the laws that are considered to be useful in the way possible and includes examples prepared by his own work experience. It states that it should not be taken for granted and the author does not take responsibility. Anyone seeking tax advice can legally seek advice directly from the preparer. In addition, guidelines and laws related to indirect taxes and administrative issues are not included in this book. This book, according to the editor's belief, is a compilation of books that focus on the laws and principles of these provisions, as the main point of this book is to explain the rules and principles.

title: ደስታን ፍለጋ
author: የአብጸጋ አምባው
description: ስለመፅሐፉ ማብራርያ ለመስጠት ያህል መፅሐፉ ሲነበብ ዶፓሚን፤ ሴሮቶኒን፣ ኦክሳሳይቶሲንና ኢንዶርፊን የተባሉ ኬሚካሎች እንዲለቀቁ በረቀቀ መንገድ ነው ያዘጋጀሁት። በመጀመሪያዎቹ ምዕራፎች ዶፓሚንን ሲያነሳሳ ቀጥሎ ባሉት ምዕራፎች እውነተኛ ደስታ ማለትም ሴሮቶኒን እንዲለቀቅ አድርጌያለሁ። መፅሐፉ ሲነበብ ሰውነታችን የደስታ ሆርሞኖችን እንዲያመነጭ በሚያደርግ መልኩ የራሴን የስነ-ፅሑፍ ፎርሙላ ተጠቅሜያለሁ። የመፅሐፉ የመጀመሪያ ምዕራፎች እንደመንደርደሪያ ሲሆኑ የታሪኩ ምርጥ ክፍል ቀጥሎ ባሉት ምዕራፎች ይገኛል። መፅሐፉ ውስጥ በልጅነት ስንዘምራቸው የነበርናቸው የልጅነት መዝሙሮች ውስጥ ያሉ ፍጡሮችና ትዕይንቶች ተካተውበታል። ለምሳሌ ብስኩት አደባባይ ፤ መሀሉ ላይ ትልቅ የጉንዳን ሐውልት ያለው በብስኩት፣ በጀላቲ በአይስክሬም የተከበበ አደባባይ ይገኛል። አደባባዩ አጠገብ ሁለት ዛፎች አሉ ። ዛፎቹ የሚስጥራዊው ዓለም በሮች ናቸው። በሚስጥራዊው ዓለም በዓይነታቸው ልዩ የሆኑ ፍጥረታትን እናገኛለን። ወንድ የሚባል ዘር አይተው የማያውቁ ድንግል ልዕልቶች፤ ዘላለም የሚኖሩ ዘጠኝ እህትማማቾች ፤ ዘላለማዊነትን የሚመልሰው መረቅ፤ የሚራመድ እሾሃማ ሀረግ ፤ አኒሞን የተባሉ ሰው በል የዕፅዋት ዘሮች ወረራ፤ ክንፍ ያላት አረንጓዴ አንበሳ.... ወዘተ የሚስጥራዊው ዓለም ነዋሪዋች ናቸው። የአካል ስነ መዋቅር ፤ ሆርሞኖች ገፀ ባህሪ ሆኖው ይናገራሉ። የደስታን ትርጉም በድርሰቱ ውስጥ ለመግለፅ ሞክሬያለሁ። መፅሐፉን በማንበብ ከታሪኮቹ ፍሰትም የደስታ ሆርሞኖች እንዲነቃቁ ለማድረግ ሞክሬያለሁ። ለዚህም የህክምና ተማሪ መሆኔ ጠቅሞኛል ብዬ አስባለሁ።

title: የሕጻናት መብት
author: ሂክማ በድሩ
description: This book presented by the author to the public is the result of long efforts and hard work. The content of the book is the result of her long-term research as a student, and it should be given due respect and recognition as it includes the extensive knowledge she has developed in the world of work and personal experience after graduation. Various legal systems that are applicable in our society and have been constitutionally recognized are included in the book. Since the author's focus is on family matters, she has tried to highlight the views of different legal systems on the matter. For legal and social science scholars who want to study the pluralism of law in the constitutional framework of our country; I hope that international and continental organizations, governmental and non-governmental organizations that work on various human rights agendas or social sector development projects with family issues, especially women's and children's rights, will use the book with due attention and recognition. Muhammad Habib (Assistant Professor): Addis Ababa University; Law School, Law Scholar This book identifies the treaties, federal and regional laws that Ethiopia has ratified that recognize children's rights; Analyze. In addition, it shows us what the implementation of the law looks like in the southern nations and peoples from the federal government. The differences between these laws and traditional and Sharia principles; It examines what unity and interaction are; It is also recommended how to identify and address violations of children's rights. In addition to the reference books, the research in the field of information; Observations and judgments are supported. It is also presented in simple Amharic. For those who carry out teaching and learning activities on children's rights; Recommended reading for those doing research and awareness training. Muradu Abdo (Assistant Professor): Addis Ababa University; Law School, Law Scholar I wrote this opinion about the book not because I was wrong, but because I was motivated by the truth I found in the book. This book, apart from being a building block for children's rights, which has been neglected and almost destroyed among us, has included messages that are suitable for both the scholar and the scholar. Ridwan Musa: Author, physician and life coach

title: ድንግልዋ ኢትዮጵያ
author: ሚቻእል እምቢአለ
description: ድንግልዋ ኢትዮጵያ ( የ150 ግጥሞች መድብል) በ ሚካኤል እምቢአለ

title: የመደመር ስካር
author: መስፊን ዪልማ
description: የሰሜኑን ጦርነት፣ በኢትዮጵያ ላይ ያሉትን ተገዳዳሪ ኃይሎች ሴራ እንዲሁም የስለላ ፉክክር ቅልብጭ አድርጎ የሚያሳይ የልቦለድ መፅሐፍ ነው።

title: ጎረጎር
author: አድዲሱ ሲሳይ
description: መጽሐፉ ሀያ ሁለት ምዕራፎች አሉት በእነዚህ ምእራፎች ውስጥ የምዕራፈ ቅዱሳን የጎረጎር ማርያም ታሪክ በትንሹም ቢሆን ቀርቦበታል።

title: ውጤታማ ተማሪ የመሆን ሚስጥሮች
author: ገቱ ሻንኮ
description: ለውጤታማ ተማሪ የመሆን ሚስጥሮች ጌቱ ሻንቆ ክፍያውን በንግድ ባንክ ሞባይል ባንክ ትራንስፈር ፈጽመዋለሁ እባካችሁ መጽሐፉን በemail ላኩልኝ፡፡

title: የሚመጣው ንጉስ
author: መስፊን ዪልማ
description: አንደኛው ዕትም ከገበያ ላይ አንድ ወር ባልሞላ ጊዜ ተሸጦ ያለቀ፣ ሚስጥራዊ ልቦለድ ነው። አንብቡት፣ በሐገር በቀል ዕውቀት ዙሪያ ያሉትን እሳቤዎች ትቃኛላችሁ።

title: ተጓዥ እንደወንዝ ብልጭታ፣ሀሳብ እና ከጥልቅ ሀሳብ የፈለቁ ነጸብራቆች
title_romanized: tagwāዥ ʼendawanz blċtā፣hasāb ʼenā kaṭlq hasāb yafalaqu naṣabrāqoč
author: ፓኡሎ ጫእልሆ ትራንስላተድ ብይ ፊክረሲላስሴ የማነ
author_romanized: Paulo Caelho translated by Fikresilassie Yemane
description: "Like the Flowing River" is a collection of essays and anecdotes written by Brazilian author Paulo Coelho. Published in 2006, the book is a compilation of Coelho's reflections on life, personal experiences, and the lessons he has learned from his travels, relationships, and encounters with various people. The essays cover a wide range of topics, including love, destiny, dreams, success, and the pursuit of one's passions. Coelho's writing style is introspective and philosophical, often encouraging readers to embrace the journey of self-discovery and find meaning in life's ordinary moments. The book's title metaphorically represents the continuous movement of life and the importance of embracing change and new experiences. Overall, "Like the Flowing River" offers readers a series of thought-provoking insights and contemplations on the human experience.

title: የእነይ ስላስ ቤት
author: ተስፋየ የኋላሸት ትራንስላተድ ብይ ፈክረሲላስሴ የ
author_romanized: Tesfaye Yehualashet Translated by Fekresilassie Ye
description: በተሇያዩ ጊዜያት ከነበሩት ፖሇቲካዊ መሪዎች ጥቂቶቹ ፖቲካዊ አመሇካከታቸዉ ፍሇስፍናቸዉ ወዯ ትግሌ እንዱወጡ ምክንያት የሆኑባቸዉ ነገሮች በህይወት ታሪካቸዉ ፣ ሌብወሇድ ፣ ግጥም እና መጣጥፍ ጽፏል።

title: ፀሃይ እና ንፋስ እንዲሁም ሌሎች አጫጭር ታሪኮች
title_romanized: ṡahāy ʼenā nfās ʼendihum léloč ʼaċāċr tārikoč
author: ሞሲሳ ዋክሹም
description: Children Amharic story book by Mosisa Wakshum

title: መሪዎችና ምርጫ
author: ሚሲከር ቲሩነህ
description: በዚህ መጽሐፍ ውስጥ መሪነት እና የመሪነት ምርጫን ለመዳሰስ ሙከራ ተደርጓል፡፡ መሪን የምንለካበት ሚዛን እና የምንመርጥበት መንገድ የተያያዙ ናቸው፡፡ ለመሪ ያለን መረዳት፣ ትክክለኛ የሆነ መሪ እንድንመርጥ ወይንም ያልሆነን መሪ እንድንመርጥ ያስገድደናል።

title: ኢስላማዊ የልጅ አስተዳደግ
author: አባስ አብዱ
description: በአስልምና አንድን ሰው ማነዕ የሚጀምረው ከቤተሰብ ነው፡ የሀገር መሠረቱ ቤተሰብ ነውና፡፡ ቤተሰብ ለተፈጥሮአዊ ጥሪ ምላሽ መስጫ መንገድ ከመሆኑም በላይ የሰውን ልጅ የህይወት ፍዓ:ላጎት ማስኬጃ፣ ልጆችን ከወላጆች ማገናኛ፣ ማህበረሰቡን ከብልሸት መጠበቂያ፤ ከሥነምግባር ውድቀት መታደጊያ መድረክ ነውና አስልምና ትልቅ እውቅና ሰጥቶታል።

title: መሀልን ፍለጋ
author: ዮናታን ተለለው
description: መሀልን መፈለግ የዘመናችን ጥሪ ሆኗል፡፡ እንደ ' እጣ ' የደረሰን ድምፅ ይህ ነው፡፡ መንገዳችን በልደት እና ሞት ሰፊ ቅንፎች ታጥሯል፡፡

title: ፍኖተ መጻሕፍት
author: ተመስገን ዘገየ
description: ይህ ‹‹ፍኖተ መጻሕፍት››የተሰኘው መጽሐፍ ለማዘጋጀት የተነሳሁበት ዋናው ምክንያት ሰዎች ከመጽሐፍ ቅዱስ ምዕራፍና ቁጥር በመፈለግ የሚያባክኑትን ሰዓት በተወሰነ መልኩ ለመቀነስና በገቢያ ላይ በብዛት የሚገኘው የጥቅስ ማውጫ የኢትዮጵያ ኦርቶዶክስ ተዋሕዶ ቤተክርስቲያን ሊቃውንት ያዘጋጁት ሳይሆን በሌሎች ቤተ እምነት የተዘጋጀ በመሆኑ ነው::

title: ነጣቂ ተኩላዎች
author: ተመስገን ዘገየ
description: የተሐድሶ ቫይረስና የአተት በሽታ መተላለፊያ መንገዱ በቅርበት ንክኪ ነው። ወደመርከቢቱ ቅድስት ቤተ ክርስቲያን የተሰበሰብነውን ወጣቶች ወደ መናፍቃን አዳራሽ ለመውሰድና በኑፋቄ ማዕበል ለማናወጽ ተሐድሶውያን ቢዘጋጁም እኛ ግን ልባችንን አልሰጠናቸውም ነው። አሁን ጥሩ መነቃቃት መነሳሳት አለ የሐራ ጥቃ ካሴቶች የእሳት ቀለብ እየሆኑ ነው።

title: በምስራቅ አፍሪካ የስልጤ ሙስሊሞች ታሪክ
author: አባስ አብዱ
description: This history book of the Silte Muslims in East Africa explains that the Silte Muslims are one of the oldest and most ancient peoples of the Islamic Sultanate. The people of Silte understood the responsibility of spreading Islam and uniting with Ethiopians and played their own role. Since the Silte Muslim is located in the central part of Ethiopia, they have hosted the up and down public movement that has been a part of the country's history for a long time due to famine and war. Thus, they have created a high level of inter-mingling and inter-mixing of people with different peoples. In short, it has a relationship with the Ethiopian nationals and the international communities that came to the country on historical occasions. The book explains that the Muslims of Silte have contributed greatly to the development and growth of Ethiopia and East Africa since ancient times by participating in small to large investment businesses.

title: ንብ ማነብና ማር ማቀናበር ሥራ ያለ አስተማሪ
title_romanized: nb mānabnā mār māqanābar śrā yāla ʼastamāri
author: አባስ አብዱ
description: Beekeeping in Ethiopia has been a long-standing activity. Our country is suitable for beekeeping because of its climate, topography and various plants. Honey and wax are the main products from beekeeping. Although the operating strategy of this sub-sub-economy is traditional and ancient, it is true that the above-mentioned products are an additional and helpful source of income for the foreign currency, either directly or indirectly.

title: የላም እርባታና ወተት ተዋጽኦ ማቀነባበር ሥራ ያለ አሰተማሪ
title_romanized: yalām ʼerbātānā watat tawāṣʼo māqanabābar śrā yāla ʼasatamāri
author: አባስ አብዱ
description: Milk cow yield (profit) is not achieved by chance or luck. It requires solving problems with various recommendations (scientific) and studying the challenges affecting the effectiveness. In terms of carrying out the mentioned activities, every worker in the dairy farm is indirectly responsible, but in a special case, the owner of the dairy farm, or in other words, the manager of the dairy farm, is the main responsible.

title: ንጉሱ አንበሳ
author: ዮናታን ተለለው
description: "The Lion King is a beloved animated film released by Disney in 1994, telling the story of Simba, a young lion cub destined to become the king of the Pride Lands. Set in the African savannah, the film explores themes of family, identity, and the circle of life. Simba's journey takes him through triumphs and tribulations as he learns important lessons about responsibility, courage, and the consequences of his actions. With memorable characters like the wise and playful Rafiki, the villainous Scar, and the lovable meerkat Timon and warthog Pumbaa, The Lion King captivated audiences with its stunning animation, powerful soundtrack featuring iconic songs such as "Circle of Life" and "Can You Feel the Love Tonight," and its timeless tale of growth, friendship, and the resilience of the human spirit."

title: ያልተገባ እጦት
author: እዩእል ፈካደ
description: ይህ ጽሁፍ በመዝሙር 23 ላይ ካሉ እውነታዎች አንጻር የተጻፈ መጽሃፍ ነው። በውስጡም በርካታ የመጽሃፍ ቅዱስ ታሪኮች እና ምሳሌዎችን በማካተት ተዘጋጅቷል።

title: ራስ-ፈጠር ባለፀጎች
author: ብሪአን ትራጭይ ትራንስላተድ ብይ መስፊን ዪልማ
author_romanized: Brian Tracy Translated by Mesfin Yilma
description: "The 21 Success Secrets of Self-Made Millionaires" by Brian Tracy is a book that explores the principles and strategies employed by individuals who have achieved financial success and become self-made millionaires. Tracy identifies 21 key secrets that these individuals share and presents them in a practical and actionable manner. The book covers various aspects of wealth creation, including mindset, goal setting, time management, sales and marketing skills, networking, and personal development. Tracy emphasizes the importance of adopting a positive mindset, having a clear vision, and setting specific goals to work towards. He also highlights the significance of continuous learning, self-discipline, and taking calculated risks as essential components of building wealth. The book provides valuable insights into effective communication, negotiation, and sales techniques that are crucial for entrepreneurial success. Furthermore, Tracy emphasizes the significance of building strong relationships and networking, as well as developing a high level of personal productivity and time management skills. He stresses the importance of taking responsibility for one's financial situation and developing a strong work ethic. "The 21 Success Secrets of Self-Made Millionaires" serves as a guide for individuals who aspire to achieve financial independence and wealth. It offers practical advice and actionable steps to help readers develop the mindset, skills, and habits necessary for success in business and finance.

title: የዶሮ እርባታና መኖ ሥራ ያለ አስተማሪ
title_romanized: yadoro ʼerbātānā mano śrā yāla ʼastamāri
author: አባስ አብዱ
description: ብዙ ሰዉ የዶሮ እርባታ ስራ ከማንናውም የስራ ዘርፍ የቀለለ እና ምንም አይነት ግብዓት እንደማይፈልግ አድርጎ ይገምታል፡፡ ይህ አስተሳሰብ የሚመነጨው በአገራችን በተለምዶ ዶሮዎች ምንም አይነት የጤና፤ የአመጋገብ፤ ወዘተ---

title: ንዝረት
author: ዘሪሁን ገመቹ
description: Author Zerihun Gemechu Wabe's second poetry book is provided you by Ethio Book Review. Enjoy the reading.

title: ነገረ ፍቅር
author: ዳኔል አለሙ
description: For centuries, mankind has been trying to define the nature of love and the wisdom behind it. Writers around the world have written thousands of words on the topic of love. Poets, philosophers, scientists and intellectuals have tried to imitate the path of love. Since the creator is love, the most powerful thing he wants us to learn and apply in our lives is love. The world started with love, the world grew in love, love is the source of strength in the world. Love is the beginning and end of everything. Love is a power that does not change its identity in any situation. In love, even sadness is happiness, bitter things are sweet, brass is gold, and hell is heaven, and prison is a purity surrounded by roses.

title: ማን ይምራ
author: እንዳልካቸው ዎስሰን
description: ‹በሰም የተጣበቀ ጥርስ ቢበሉበት አያደቅ ቢስቁበት አያደምቅምና› ፈረንጆች ስለ አንድነት እንዲህ ይላሉ፡፡ “If we unite, we stand” If we divide, we fall down, የእኛም የጥንት ሊቃውንት ‹‹ድር ቢያብር አንበሳ ያስር›› ብለው ሲናገሩ ሰንሰለታዊ ቁርኝት ያላቸው ድሮች ቢለያዩም ረብየለሽ መሆናቸው ስለሚታመንበት ነው፡፡

title: መርሀ ቤተሰብ
author: ነቢዩ በርሄ
description: The saddest part of life is not when we die, but when we live, we fail to truly live. When we are alive, we only live a small part of it. Our humanity is not seen using the full surface of daylight. To put it in English, what is of great value in our lives is not the amount of money we have accumulated, but how much of our abilities we have spent on activities that add value to our goals. To tell the truth, the most important thing is the legacy or legacy we leave behind for the people. When Tolestoy put this fact in his beautiful angel, he said, "We live for ourselves and for others as well." It took me forty years to understand wisdom or genius. Good results flow into our lives and follow as an unintended but inevitable byproduct of life, a price paid to enrich the lives of others. When we change our daily routine from a need or compulsion to a lifelong habit, our lifestyle is transformed into one of great effectiveness, not sham.

title: ባለ'ዳ
author: መኪት ፋንቱ
description: Mekit Fantu's another best Amharic fiction book is here. Buy PDF and enjoy reading it.

title: እንደዋዛ
author: መኪት ፋንቱ
description: መቅድም ሁለተኛ ዲግሪዋን ለመጨረስ ዋዜማ ላይ ነች። የመመረቅያ ጥናት፤ ቴሲሷን ለመሥራት እያሟሟቀች ነው። ትንፋሿን ሰብሰብ አደርጋ ልትሠራበት ያሰበችው ርዕሰ ጉዳይ እጅጉን ቀልቧን ገዝቶታል። መካነ መቃብራት ለታሪክ መዘክርነት ሊኖራቸው የሚችለው ፋይዳ ላይ ነው።

title: የፒያሳዋ ምስጢራዊ ወፍ
author: ዘሪሁን ገመቹ
description: …እራሴን ላለመሳት መጣር ጀመርኩ። ደሜ ቱቦው እንደተሰበረ የውሀ መስመር ይንፎለላል፤ እንደምንም ከጭለማው ወደ ብርሀኑ መውጣት አለብኝ..ወደ ዋናው መንገድ..ለሁለት ተከፍሎ የተቀደደውን ቲሸርቴን እንደምንም አወለኩና የሞት ሞቴን በወገቤ አዙሬ የተዘረገፈውን አንጀቴን አንድ ላይ ሰብሰብ አድርጎ እዲይዝልኝ በታቻለኝ ኃይል አጥብቄ አሰርኩትና መሳብ ጀመርኩ፡፡

title: የምስራቋ ፀሀይ

title: ግማሽ ፍርድ
author: ቢኒአም ጀምበረ
description: ..የትኛው ጊዜ ላይ? በየትኛው ትውልድ? ከጥንት አባቶቻችን ጀምሮ ሲወርድ ሲዋረድ እየዳመነ መጥቶ እኛ ዘመን ላይ ዶፉን አውርዶት የልዩነት ጎርፍ አፈራረሰን? ወይስ ከቅርብ ዓመታት ወዲህ? ይህን መለየት ያስፈልጋል፡፡ ያኔ የፈረሰበት ስፍራ ላይ አንጸን አንሠራዋለን፡፡ ምከንያቱም ሀገር ማለት በየዘመኑ የተነሱ የትውልዱ መሪዎች እየነቀሉ የሚተከሏት ሳትኾን፣ ትናንት ላይ ተራምደን፣ ዛሬን ተግተን፣ ነገን ለትውልዱ ተስፋና አውነት ለግሰን የምናሻግራት ናት።

title: መመለስ
author: ቢርቱካን ሚደክሳ
description: New Amharic Book by prominent Ethiopian politician Birtukan Mideksa

title: ያልተመለሱ ዳናዎች
author: ካህሳይ አብራሀ
description: Discover the untold memories of Ethiopia’s revolutionary past in ያልተመለሱ ዳናዎች, the compelling follow-up to Kahsay Abraha’s acclaimed የአሲምባ ፍቅር (Asimba’s Love). This powerful memoir offers a rare glimpse into the Ethiopian People's Revolutionary Army (EPRDF), capturing the struggles, sacrifices, and personal experiences of its members. Unlike the first book, which focused on personal autobiography, this volume dives deeper into the history of the army, the organization’s founding, and the challenges it faced over the decades. Readers will encounter honest reflections, emotional truths, and moments that illuminate the complexities of that era, providing a broader understanding of Ethiopia’s revolutionary generation. Perfect for history enthusiasts, students, and anyone interested in Ethiopia’s modern history, ያልተመለሱ ዳናዎች is both a tribute to a generation’s sacrifices and a thoughtful exploration of questions that remain unresolved in the nation’s past. This book continues the conversation about courage, love for the country, and the importance of recording history for future generations.

title: ዮዲታ
author: ሮማን ተዎልደ
description: “ዮዲታ” – Roman Tewolde Releases Her New Autobiography Roman Tewolde, one of Ethiopia’s most influential reading-culture advocates on social media, has officially released her new autobiography “ዮዲታ” (Yodita). The book, published on November 14, 2025, shares her personal story growing up in a prominent Ethiopian family and reflects on the experiences that shaped her life. Roman is the daughter of the celebrated scientist Dr. Tewolde-Berhan Gebre-Egziabher and ecological activist Sue Edwards—figures widely respected in Ethiopia and beyond. In Yodita, she offers a brief yet heartfelt look into her childhood, family legacy, and memories of Asmara during a transformative period in Ethiopian and Eritrean history. The book also touches on the influence of well-known family members, including writer Sibhat Gebre-Egziabher and Yoseph Gebre-Egziabher, adding literary and historical depth to her story. “ዮድታ” is now available in paperback, making it one of the most anticipated new Ethiopian books of the year, especially among readers who follow Roman’s work online and her efforts to promote a reading culture.

title: የምታስበውን ትሆናለህ
author: ኖርማን ቪንጨንት ፐአለ
description: “The Power of Positive Thinking,” originally by Norman Vincent Peale and translated into Amharic as “የምታስበውን ትሆናለህ” by Biniam Alemayehu, is a timeless guide that helps readers reshape their mindset, replace doubt with confidence, and build a more hopeful attitude toward life. The book focuses on practical steps for overcoming negativity, strengthening inner belief, and creating a positive mental environment that leads to better decisions, healthier relationships, and a more fulfilled life. Its Amharic edition makes these life-changing ideas accessible and relatable for Ethiopian readers seeking emotional clarity and personal empowerment.

title: የኀያልነት ሕጎች
author: ሮበርት ግረእነ ሀኒም እሊአስ
description: “The 48 Laws of Power,” translated into Amharic by Hanim Elias as “የኀያልነት ሕጎች,” is one of the most talked-about books in the world—admired by some, feared by others, but never ignored. Robert Greene explores how power works in relationships, workplaces, politics, business, and everyday life. It’s not a book that tells you to dominate others; instead, it reveals the rules people already use, often without admitting it. In an Ethiopian context, where social interactions are layered with respect, hierarchy, culture, and unspoken expectations, the ideas in this book feel surprisingly relatable. Whether you're navigating office politics, leading a team, building influence, or simply trying to understand the intentions of others, the insights can be eye-opening. The book breaks down patterns of human behavior—how people gain trust, lose respect, manipulate, protect themselves, and rise to leadership. Some laws teach caution, others encourage confidence. Many readers say it challenges your thinking and helps you see situations more clearly. And even if you don’t want to use every law, understanding them helps you recognize when they’re being used on you. If you want the Amharic edition “የኀያልነት ሕጎች,” you can find reading options, delivery, and PDF-related information on Ethiobookreview.com. It’s one of those books worth returning to again and again—especially for professionals, leaders, negotiators, or anyone trying to understand the psychology of influence.

title: የገንዘብ ሳይኮሎጂ
author: ዉድሰው ደግዋላ
description: “Money Psychology,” translated into Amharic by Wudsew Degwala as “የገንዘብ ሳይኮሎጂ,” takes a deep look at the emotional side of money. Instead of talking only about budgets and numbers, the book explains why people struggle with saving, spending wisely, or making long-term financial decisions. It’s a guide that shows how our minds—our beliefs, fears, and habits—shape our financial realities more than we think. For many Ethiopians dealing with rising prices, supporting family members, or trying to start a business with limited capital, this book feels extremely relevant. It helps you understand the hidden thoughts that influence your money behavior and gives simple, practical tips you can use immediately.

title: የቢዝነስ ጥበብ
author: ራሰልላ ጋሻነህ
description: “The Personal MBA” by Josh Kaufman, translated into Amharic by Rasellas Gashaneh as “የቢዝነስ ጥበብ,” is a powerful book that breaks down the core skills of business into simple, practical lessons. Instead of spending years in expensive MBA programs, Kaufman shows that anyone can master business thinking through clear principles and real-world understanding. This book is especially relevant for Ethiopian entrepreneurs, managers, students, and professionals looking to strengthen their business foundations. What the Book Is About (Short Summary) 1. Understand How Businesses Really Work The book explains the five key elements every business needs: value creation, marketing, sales, value delivery, and finance. 2. Make Better Decisions Kaufman introduces mental models that help you solve problems, think strategically, and avoid common business mistakes. 3. Learn Essential Leadership & Management Skills From team motivation to communication and productivity, the book provides tools that improve performance in organizations of any size. 4. Build Systems That Scale Clear workflows, efficiency, and process optimization help businesses grow sustainably.

title: ከማዕበል ማዶ
author: ተስፋየ ማሞ
description: Tesfaye Mamo Wendmiagegnehu is a celebrated Ethiopian author, artist, and media personality, widely recognized for hosting the popular radio program “Ye Tibeb Menged” on Sheger FM 102.1. Beyond his media presence, he has made a significant mark in the advertising industry with creative campaigns that resonate with Ethiopian audiences. He has authored this book “ከማዕበል ማዶ,” which showcases his storytelling talent and cultural insights, further cementing his status as a prominent figure in Ethiopia’s literary and creative landscape.

title: የሃበሻ ጀብዱ
author: አዶልፍ  ፓርለሳክ ተቻነ ጆብረ መኮንነን
description: “የሃበሻ ጀብዱ (Abyssinian Odyssey)” is a powerful memoir by Czech writer Adolf Parlesák, translated into Amharic by Techane Jobre Mekonnen and published by Addis Ababa University Press. The book recounts Parlesák’s life in Ethiopia during the turbulent 1930s, particularly his role as a military advisor during the Italo‑Ethiopian War. He shares deeply personal stories of fighting alongside Ethiopian soldiers, giving readers a front-row seat to the bravery, suffering, and resilience of those defending their homeland. Beyond its war narrative, the book provides a rich historical portrait of Ethiopia under Emperor Haile Selassie, including profiles of prominent commanders such as Dejazmach Abera Kassa. Parlesák’s observations go beyond battles — he captures the spirit, culture, and patriotism of Ethiopians during one of their most dramatic chapters. Through this firsthand testimony, readers gain a nuanced understanding of Ethiopian identity, the cost of resistance, and the broader geopolitical stakes of that era.

title: ኢቮሊዩሽን የተረጋገጠ ሳይንስ ወይስ እምነት?
author: መምሂር ያረጋል አበጋዝ
description: “ኢቮሊዩሽን የተረጋገጠ ሳይንስ ወይስ እምነት - Evolution: Proven Science or Belief?” by Memhir Yaregal Abegaz presents a critical examination of Darwin’s evolutionary theory, questioning whether its core claims truly stand on solid scientific ground. The book highlights how many widely accepted evolutionary ideas operate more like belief systems than evidence-based conclusions. By reviewing scientific literature, evaluating commonly cited proofs, and exposing gaps and inconsistencies, the author argues that the complexity of life and the universe points to intentional design rather than random mutation. This insightful work provides readers with a balanced exploration of the origins debate, blending scientific inquiry with theological wisdom. Memhir Yaregal simplifies complex scientific arguments, helping readers form an informed personal perspective on where humanity came from and how creation began. The book is especially valuable for students, researchers, and anyone interested in the conversation between science, evolution, and faith within the Ethiopian Orthodox Christian context.

title: በጥበበ መኖር
author: ማርክ ማንሶን ትራንስላተድ ብይ ሀኒም እሊአስ
author_romanized: Mark Manson Translated by Hanim Elias
description: “The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck,” written by Mark Manson and translated into Amharic by Hanim Elias as “በጥበብ መኖር,” is a refreshing, no-nonsense guide to living a more meaningful life. Instead of chasing unrealistic positivity, the book teaches how to accept life’s difficulties and focus energy only on what truly matters. For Ethiopian readers balancing work, family, social expectations, and personal dreams, this book offers a grounded and honest approach to emotional well-being. Book Summary 1. You Can’t Care About Everything Trying to please everyone drains your energy. The book helps you choose the values, goals, and relationships worth investing in. 2. Problems Are a Part of Life Happiness doesn’t come from comfort—it comes from solving meaningful problems. Manson encourages embracing responsibility and growth. 3. Accept Your Limitations Understanding your limits brings freedom. You become more focused, confident, and intentional in your decisions. 4. Learn to Say “No” Confidently Healthy boundaries protect your time, peace, and emotional health.

title: ተራራው አንተ ነህ
author: ብሪአንና ዌስት ሀኒም እሊአስ
description: “The Mountain Is You” by Brianna Wiest, translated into Amharic by Hanim Elias as “ተራራው አንተ ነህ,” is a deep and inspiring book about confronting the emotional struggles that hold us back. The “mountain” in the title represents our own fears, past wounds, and self-sabotaging behaviors—barriers we must transform to grow. The book speaks directly to anyone dealing with stress, emotional heaviness, heartbreak, or personal stagnation—experiences many Ethiopian readers can relate to. What the Book Is About (Short Summary) 1. Self-Sabotage Comes From Unhealed Emotions Wiest explains how our deepest habits often come from old pain. Understanding this helps us take control instead of repeating harmful cycles. 2. Growth Begins When You Face Your Inner Mountain The book encourages confronting fear, insecurity, and limiting beliefs with courage and compassion. 3. Emotional Intelligence Creates Strength By managing your emotions better, you gain clarity, confidence, and the ability to make healthier decisions. 4. Transformation Is a Process Small, consistent improvements—rather than sudden changes—eventually reshape your life.

title: ገደብ የለሽ ሁን
author: ጂም ክዊክ ትራንስላተድ ብይ ፍሉይ አለም
author_romanized: Jim Kwik translated by Fluy Alem
description: “Limitless” by Jim Kwik, translated into Amharic by Fluy Alem as “ገደብ የለሽ ሁን,” is a powerful guide that teaches how to break mental limitations and unlock your true potential. The book introduces practical techniques to boost learning speed, concentration, memory, and confidence—skills very relevant for students, professionals, and lifelong learners in Ethiopia. Book Summary 1. Your Mind Has No Limits Kwik explains that most limitations come from belief systems and habits, not actual capability. You can reprogram your thinking to achieve more. 2. Learn Faster and Remember Better The book provides effective memory tools, learning strategies, and focus-building exercises—perfect for students, exam takers, and anyone learning new skills. 3. Break Old Patterns Fear, doubt, and negative self-talk hold many people back. “ገደብ የለሽ ሁን” shows how to challenge these patterns and build empowering mindset routines. 4. Upgrade Your Brain for Success Healthy habits, proper rest, nutrition, and mental exercises all contribute to a stronger, more productive mind.

title: ከዜሮ ወደ አንድ
author: ፐተር ትhieል ትራንስላተድ ብይ ቢርሀኑ በላቸው
author_romanized: Peter Thiel Translated by Birhanu Belachew
description: “From Zero to One,” written by Peter Thiel and translated into Amharic by Birhanu Belachew as “ከዜሮ ወደ አንድ,” is one of the most influential books for entrepreneurs, innovators, and anyone who wants to create something original. The book explains how progress happens in two ways: Going from 1 to n: copying what already exists Going from 0 to 1: creating something new and unique

title: ስሜትን በብልኃት መምራት
author: ዳኔል ጎለማን ትራንስላተድ ብይ ቢርሀኑ በላቸው
author_romanized: Daniel Goleman translated by Birhanu Belachew
description: “Emotional Intelligence,” written by Daniel Goleman and translated into Amharic by Birhanu Belachew as “ስሜትን በብልኃት መምራት”, is a groundbreaking book that shows how understanding and managing your emotions can dramatically improve your personal and professional life. For Ethiopian readers, it provides a practical guide to emotional awareness, better relationships, and smarter decision-making. Book Summary The book explores key emotional skills, including: Recognizing and managing your own emotions Understanding the emotions of others (empathy) Handling social interactions and conflicts effectively Making decisions based on emotional awareness Developing self-discipline, resilience, and social skills

title: የድብቁ አይምሮ ሀይል
author: ጆሰጵ ሙርጵይ ትራንስላተድ ብይ ፍሉይ አለም
author_romanized: Joseph Murphy Translated by Fluy Alem
description: “The Power of Your Subconscious Mind,” written by Joseph Murphy and translated into Amharic by Fluy Alem as “የድብቁ አይምሮ ሀይል”, is a life-transforming book that explains how your subconscious mind shapes your thoughts, behavior, and outcomes. For Ethiopian readers, the book provides practical strategies to reprogram the mind for success, health, and personal growth. Book Summary The book explains that the subconscious mind is a powerful force that can: Influence your habits and daily choices Attract opportunities through positive thinking Reduce fear, stress, and limiting beliefs Improve health, wealth, and personal relationships Help you achieve goals by focusing thoughts constructively

title: ዥዋዥዌ
author: ሂዎት እሚሻው
description: Hiwot Emishaws new Amharic book titled ዥዋዥዌ is out. Enjoy reading a book from this famous Ethiopian 6 books author.

title: የዐዲሱ ዓለም ክርስትና እና የስሕበት ሕግ ከዐዲሱ ዘመን እንቅስቃሴ እና እሳቤ ጋር
title_romanized: yaʻadisu ʻālam krstnā ʼenā yasḥbat ḥg kaʻadisu zaman ʼenqsqāsé ʼenā ʼesābé gār
author: መምሄር ዘበነ ለምማ
description: Renowned Ethiopian Orthodox preacher and scholar Memher Dr. Zebene Lemma, who is widely followed on Facebook and YouTube, has released a new Amharic book titled “የዐዲሱ ዓለም ክርስትና እና የስሕበት ሕግ ከዐዲሱ ዘመን እንቅስቃሴ እና እሳቤ ጋር.” The book offers a deep look into the relationship between modern Christianity, social movements, and the laws of morality in the changing world. Dr. Zebene Lemma, who lives in the USA, is known for his insightful teachings that explain Orthodox faith principles and address questions from non-believers and followers of other religions. This latest publication has already attracted strong interest among Ethiopian readers and Orthodox Christians who admire Memher Dr. Zebene Lemma’s intellectual and spiritual clarity. Through this book, he continues his mission of guiding believers in understanding how today’s global ideologies, media trends, and social behaviors influence Christian values. Readers can find this book in major Ethiopian bookstores and online platforms soon.

title: የመደመር መንግስት
author: አቢይ አህመድ
description: Ethiopian Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed has officially launched his fourth book titled “የመደመር መንግስት” (Government of Medemer) in Amharic and “Mootummaa Ida'amuu” in Afaan Oromo, continuing his signature “Medemer” philosophy. Known worldwide for coining the word “መደመር” (to be added together), Abiy Ahmed emphasizes unity, collective growth, and building an African-centered ideology instead of adopting Western philosophies. Just like his previous works, this new book reflects on how society can achieve prosperity through togetherness, harmony, and a shared national vision. The launch has attracted significant attention as readers, researchers, and political analysts explore how the Prime Minister frames governance within the Medemer philosophy. This latest publication follows Abiy Ahmed’s three earlier books: “መደመር”, “የመደመር መንገድ” (The Way of Medemer), and “የመደመር ትውልድ” (The Generation of Medemer). With the release of “የመደመር መንግስት”, he expands his vision by linking unity with the concept of governance, aiming to inspire Ethiopians to think beyond divisions and embrace inclusiveness. The book is expected to become a central topic in Ethiopia’s intellectual and political discussions, making it an essential read for anyone interested in contemporary Ethiopian thought, leadership philosophy, and the Prime Minister’s long-term vision for the nation.

title: ከልጅነት እሰከ ልጁነት
author: ዘሪቱ ከበደ
description: Ethiopian music star Zeritu Kebede has released her inspiring new book titled “ከልጅነት እስከ ልጁነት” (From Childhood to Being His Child). In this heartfelt memoir, Zeritu opens up about her personal journey, from her early life and struggles to her spiritual rebirth in faith. The book reflects on her transition into a deeper Christian life, her recent challenges, and how faith reshaped her path. A must-read for fans, believers, and anyone seeking encouragement through life’s trials.

title: እሳቷ ጠበቃ እና ሌሎችም የችሎት ወጎች
title_romanized: ʼesātwa ṭabaqā ʼenā léločm yačlot wagoč
author: ካሰ መልካም
description: እሳቷ ጠበቃ እና ሌሎችም የችሎት ወጎች New Amharic book based on different court hearings in Ethiopia. Enjoy Reading.

title: ዝይን
author: አለማየሁ ገላጋይ
description: Zeyin New Amharic book by prominent Ethiopian author Alemayehu Gelagay is released. Enjoy reading.

title: የአፄ ዘርዐ ያዕቆብ እና ስራዎቹ
author: እንግ. ተዎድሮስ ደመከ & ድር አንዷለም አባተ
author_romanized: Eng. Tewodros Demeke & Dr Andualem Abate
description: A comprehensive new historical book titled “የአፄ ዘርዐ ያዕቆብ እና ስራዎቹ” has been published, co-authored by Engineer Tewodros Demeke and Dr. Andualem Abate. Spanning 547 pages across 19 chapters, the book offers an in-depth account of the life, leadership, and contributions of Emperor Zera Yacob—one of Ethiopia’s most influential medieval monarchs. The authors meticulously document his early life, rise to power, and the centralization of governance during his reign. The book examines the emperor’s administrative structure, military organization, justice system, religious practices, and his efforts to maintain unity amid political and theological challenges. Readers will also find rich content on topics such as Ethiopia’s territorial extent, its internal administrative regions, foreign relations, contemporary arts and literature, the origin of the national flag, and the historical truth about the Double Cross of Jesus Christ. Other highlighted subjects include the emperor's environmental conservation practices, the influential role of Queen Eleni, and the legacy of his heir, Emperor Beede Mariam. This well-researched and engaging work sheds light on a pivotal era in Ethiopian history and serves as a valuable resource for scholars, history enthusiasts, and readers interested in Ethiopia’s medieval heritage.

title: ኦዛና ምኒልክ
author: ነጉስሴ አየለ ተካ
description: A highly researched and well-written book titled "Ozana Menelik" by author Niguse Ayele Teka was launched on Saturday, July 5, 2025. Previously, Niguse Ayele, who wrote and presented a highly read book titled "ታላቁ ጥቁር [The Great Black]" about Menelik II, has now completed "Ozana Menelik" for reading after extensive research. "Ozana Menelik" is a deeply researched work that explains the untold truths about Menelik II in detail and contains 460 pages. The book explains that Ethiopia was a country that had a positive image in American newspapers 125 years ago, and analyzes how Menelik's representatives, such as Haji Abdullahi, presented letters to US President Theodore Roosevelt. At the inauguration program, critic Demelash Amare presented a book review on Ozana and Menelik, and a short audio documentary about Emperor Menelik II was also presented. Statistician Behailu Gebremedhin also presented a short discourse on the Menelik era in his own words. The guests of honor for the day were General Kasaye Chemeda, anthropologists Dr. Berhane Asfaw and Dr. Yonas Beyene. Author Niguse Ayele Teka was presented with the "ታላላቆቹን እናክብር [Celebrate the Great]" award from the Tewedaj Media on the day, and those who contributed to the book launch and the event were also recognized. Niguse Ayele Teka has previously read ሐኖስ ፣የገራዶ ዋሽንት፣ ጣዝማ and 7 other books, and graduated from the Department of Ethiopian Languages ​​and Literature in the mid-1970s.

title: የዘመን ጠብታ
author: ዘሪሁን ታደስሰ
description: Poet Zerihun Tadesse has released a new collection of 50 poems titled “የዘመን ጠብታ”, now available on the AfroRead mobile app for $3.99 (85 ETB). The book features poems that capture deep reflections, emotions, and lived experiences drawn from modern Ethiopian life. An audiobook version of “የዘመን ጠብታ” is also in the works and will be released soon, making the poetry accessible to a wider audience through audio format.

title: የኢትዮጵያ የፍትሐብሔር ሥነ-ሥርዓት ሕግ
author: ካሰ መልካም
description: This book is a comprehensive legal reference book that compiles over 400 landmark decisions from the Federal Supreme Court and House of Federation, with a special focus on Alternative Dispute Resolution (ADR). This book explores critical judicial interpretations on litigation periods, the right to file lawsuits, land disputes, commercial claims, inheritance, and family matters. It also analyzes contrasting limitation periods set for parental disputes and explains how key rulings have shaped Ethiopian procedural law. Ideal for law students, legal practitioners, judges, and policymakers, this updated Amharic legal text provides deep insight into modern civil procedure rooted in real case decisions.

title: የሕይወት መንገድ
author: መልካሙ ተፈራ
description: "የሕይወት መንገድ" (The Path of Life) is a powerful new Amharic book by Ethiopian author Melkamu Tefera, written for readers seeking answers to life’s deepest spiritual questions. Aimed especially at those who question or deny the existence of God, this thought-provoking book presents strong arguments and reflections about the existence of the Creator. With clarity and passion, the author challenges atheistic beliefs and invites readers to explore faith, purpose, and the hope of eternal life. Whether you're a believer, a seeker, or simply curious, "የሕይወት መንገድ" offers spiritual insight grounded in Ethiopian context and Christian philosophy. A must-read for anyone interested in faith, truth, and the path to salvation.

title: 101 የጥበብ ጠብታዎች
author: ድር ወዳጀነህ መሀረነ
description: Dr. Wedajeneh Meharene, a well-known voice in Ethiopia, has just released a new Amharic book titled “101 የጥበብ ጠብታዎች [101 Drops of Wisdom]”. The book brings together short, thoughtful messages based on his years of experience as a pastor, public speaker, and educator. Written in a simple and relatable way, it’s perfect for anyone looking for life advice rooted in faith, psychology, and Ethiopian culture. This latest release adds to Dr. Wedajeneh’s earlier works like “Closure,” “የእመቤታችን ታላቅ አእምሮ,” and “የመላዕክት አለቆች በእናት ሀገር.” He is not only a Doctor of Medicine but also holds three Master’s degrees, making his books rich in insight and real-life lessons. If you're in the U.S. or Canada, look out for his book signing events happening from July to August—a great chance to meet the author and get a signed copy.

title: ልባም ሴት
author: ዘላለም የሳቲን ወርክ
description: Zelalem Yesatin Werk’s 26th Amharic poetry book, Libam Set (Wise Woman), is a soulful and philosophical meditation on womanhood, wisdom, and the inner world of a poet. Interweaving biblical allusions with personal reflections, the collection elevates the image of the "wise woman" as a symbol of spiritual depth, emotional resilience, and transformative power. Through rich metaphors—like pebbles reserved for the day of struggle or dreams woven into hair—the poems explore themes of love, memory, struggle, and healing. Libam Set closes with a tribute to feminine wisdom as a “bright sentence” and a “beautiful life story,” suggesting that behind every moment of chaos lies the grace of a woman’s enduring strength.

title: የአፍሪካ ቀንድ
author: ሀኢለ መስከል በሸዋምየለህ
description: Now available in Amharic, "The Horn of Africa" by renowned scholar Christopher Clapham has been expertly translated by Haile Meskel Beshewamyeleh. This groundbreaking book explores why the Horn of Africa—home to Ethiopia, Eritrea, Somalia, Somaliland, and Djibouti—stands out as one of Africa’s most unique and complex regions. With a focus on Ethiopia’s historical resilience and regional influence, the book offers powerful insights into how geography, empire, colonial legacy, and political fragmentation have shaped the region's past and present. Clapham examines how Ethiopia, as the only African empire to resist European colonization and engage in its own imperial expansion, influenced neighboring states and created a region distinct from the rest of post-colonial Africa. Since the pivotal year of 1991, when both Eritrea and Somaliland declared independence, the Horn has experienced vastly different political paths—from Somalia’s state collapse to Eritrea’s isolation and Ethiopia’s ongoing developmental challenges. Translated into Amharic as "የአፍሪካ ቀንድ", this edition provides Ethiopian readers with a deeper understanding of the Horn's state-building struggles, regional tensions, and the long-lasting impact of history on modern governance and identity.

title: ከስቃይ-ስ--
author: ሰብሀት ተመስገን
description: This book, written by author Sebhat Temesgen, is a fiction and the genre of the book revolves around our cultural and material values; beliefs; education system; economic and social issues. It is written in a simple style to be read by all communities. Read it while having fun and learn something from it. The book is available in all bookstores in Addis Ababa city. For more information, call ☎️ 0911917820.

title: መንግሥቱ ኃይለ ማርያም የስደተኛው መሪ ትረካዎች
title_romanized: mangśtu hāyla māryām yasdatañāw mari trakāwoč
author: ዪታገሱ ገተነት ገበይሁ
description: መንግሥቱ ኃይለ ማርያም የስደተኛው መሪ ትረካዎች (Mengistu Haile Mariam: Yesidetegnaw Meri Tirekawoch) is a powerful autobiographical account released in September 2024 by Ethiopian author Yitagesu Getenet Gebeyhu. Based on exclusive interviews with the exiled former leader Mengistu Hailemariam, this book unveils a rarely seen side of one of Ethiopia’s most controversial political figures. Moving beyond the public narrative of his presidency and the Red Terror era, the book explores personal stories, early life experiences, and deep reflections that shaped his political journey and life in exile. This must-read memoir offers a humanizing lens into the complex identity of Mengistu Hailemariam, presenting readers with raw insight into his inner world—his thoughts, regrets, justifications, and resilience. Mengistu Haile Mariam: Yesidetegnaw Meri Tirekawoch challenges readers to explore the untold dimensions of modern Ethiopian history, making it an essential book for political scholars, history lovers, and anyone curious about Ethiopia’s past and its lasting impact.

title: አዲሲቱ አየሩሳሌም
author: ደሞዝ ጎሺመ
description: Book Summary: አዲሲቱ አየሩሳሌም (The New Jerusalem) by Demoz Goshime አዲሲቱ አየሩሳሌም (The New Jerusalem) by Demoz Goshime is a deep and thoughtful continuation of the author’s earlier works, Sostegnaw Kidan and 16. This book brings the ideas and spiritual reflections from those books into a unified conclusion, focusing on one powerful theme — rest. In a world full of stress and uncertainty, the book invites readers to think about the ultimate rest and peace that humanity has long been searching for. The author presents this rest not just as a concept, but as a city — the New Jerusalem — full of symbolic meaning. It is described as a person, as a mother, and as a spiritual place prepared by God. Using biblical references, especially from the words of Christ and the visions of John the Apostle, Demoz Goshime shows how the city reflects God's eternal kingdom, where rest is not only a spiritual end but also a divine embrace. This book is recommended for readers who enjoy spiritual literature with rich metaphors and deep biblical insights. It connects themes of motherhood, creation, divine love, and heavenly hope, all tied to the final rest promised to humanity. አዲሲቱ አየሩሳሌም is a meaningful read for those seeking inspiration and understanding about God’s eternal promise and the deeper mysteries of faith.

title: በዓሉ ግርማ ሕይወቱና ስራዎቹ
author: እንዳለገታ ከበደ
description: Book Summary Written by Endalegeta Kebede, በዓሉ ግርማ ሕይወቱና ስራዎቹ (Bealu Girma – His Life and Works) is a deeply researched biography that explores the life, background, and powerful writings of Ethiopia’s legendary author Bealu Girma. The book starts with Bealu’s early years — his place of birth, childhood experiences, and the story behind his Indian father. It also covers how he was separated from his mother, moved to Addis Ababa, and took the name of his stepfather Girma. Readers follow his journey through school, from elementary to university. Endalegeta does more than just tell Bealu’s life story — he digs deep into the characters and messages in Bealu's novels, giving special focus to his most famous work, Oromay. The book also gives rich detail about Bealu’s friendships, his views, and his political involvement during both Emperor Haile Selassie’s time and the Derg regime. It is both a biography and a thoughtful literary analysis that shines light on Bealu’s impact on Ethiopian literature and society. This book is a must-read for anyone curious about Bealu Girma, his powerful books, and the world he lived in. Originally published in 2015 and updated in 2024, it stands as one of the most complete works about Bealu Girma’s life and legacy. Whether you're a fan of Ethiopian literature or looking to learn about one of the country's greatest writers, this book is an excellent choice.

title: ማለዳ ደጃፍ ላይ
author: እደን ሀብታሙ
description: This book is an introspective exploration of loneliness, identity, and the quiet resilience found in everyday life. Through expressive and evocative language, the narrative follows individuals who have lived in isolation—yet possess a subtle charm that speaks volumes. The story is structured around the customs and rituals of each month, presenting life as a series of unfolding moments that mirror the rhythm of time and tradition. Told through the eyes of a reflective character, the book captures the small yet profound experiences that shape human existence. From the gentle steam rising in the morning to the internal cleansing that comes with self-awareness, the narrative invites readers to journey inward. It speaks of jealousy, wonder, pain, and inspiration—highlighting the emotional weight of memories and the complexity of our inner worlds. A standout section of the book reflects on creativity and the silenced voices of writers and artists who have been overlooked or dismissed by society. Their stories—marked by hardship, brilliance, and persistence—serve as a powerful reminder of the importance of expression. Rich in imagery and insight, this work is more than a literary piece; it is an emotional companion, encouraging readers to pause, reflect, and find meaning in the unseen corners of life.

title: ምን ሆኛለሁ
author: ቲጊስት ዋልታነጉስ አንድ ተዎድሮስ ተክለአረጋይ
description: Book Launch: "ምን ሆኛለሁ?" A book by Psychoterapist and Media Personality Tigist WaltaNegus and Tewodros T/Aregay is Officially Unveiled in Silver Spring, Maryland The much-anticipated book "ምን ሆኛለሁ?", co-authored by Tigist Waltanegus and Tewodros T/Aregay was officially launched on November 9 in Silver Spring, Maryland. The event brought together literature enthusiasts, supporters, and members of the community to celebrate the release of this compelling new work. The launch was made possible with the support of Megabi Ephrem of EgziabherAb Church in Virginia and The Yoftahe Show, along with generous sponsorship from Mrs. Eskedar of Berhan Financials. Liyou Events played a key role in organizing the gathering, while Prime Cafe provided additional support to ensure the event’s success. The evening was filled with engaging discussions, reflections on the book’s themes, and a warm atmosphere that highlighted the significance of storytelling. Adding to the celebrations, the event also coincided with the birthday of one of the co-authors, making the occasion even more special. "ምን ሆኛለሁ?" is now officially available, and readers can look forward to an insightful and thought-provoking experience.

title: በፍቅር መንገድ
author: አለማየሁ ገብረሂዎት
description: Alemayehu Gebrehiwot, the author of Befiker Menged, is also a playwright and published poet. He has written and translated numerous plays for radio, television, and stage, many of which— including two children's plays—have been presented to Ethiopian audiences. Among his notable works are his Amharic translations of Oscar Wilde’s Lady and other major productions.

title: የዘርሲዎች ፍቅር  (ድንግል ውበት)
author: ፊክረማርኮስ ደስታ
description: This book highlights the invaluable wisdom that comes with experience and age, using a skyboard as a metaphor for personal growth and self-discovery. It explores the journey of identity, where one's essence evolves over time. More than just a story, the book creates a deep connection—between people, between humanity and nature. It takes the reader on a journey through the sky and across rivers, from Spain to the Rift Valley, bringing back what was once lost and restoring forgotten memories to where they truly belong.

title: አሐቲ ድንግል
author: አባ ገብረ ኪዳን ጊርማ
description: የሚያረካ የመጻሕፍት ፊት አውራሪ ፤ የነገረ ማርያም ጥም ቆራጭ ፤ የትርጓሜ ድግስ ፤ የምሥጢራት ዝናም ፣ ያለ ስስት በፍቅር የተጻፈ ቅኔ መወድስ ፤ እንደ ሊቅ በምሥጢር እየተራቀቁ እንደ መናኝ በፍቅር እሳት እየተማወቁ የጻፉት በጸዳለ ምሥጢር የተጽደለደለ መጽሐፍ ተከስቶአል::

title: የዩቲዩብ ሚስጥሮች
author: አበል ቢርሀኑ
description: Beginner's Guide to YouTube secret By Abel Birhanu, A YouTube Star with 1.7 Million Subscribers If you’re an aspiring content creator looking to break into the world of YouTube, there’s no better guide than Abel Birhanu’s latest book, “የዩትዩብ ሚስጥሮች” (Secrets of YouTube). Written in Amharic, this comprehensive guide taps into Abel’s personal journey as a YouTube star with over 1.7 million subscribers, offering a treasure trove of insights and actionable steps tailored for Ethiopian and global audiences alike. Why You Should Read This Book Abel Birhanu is not just a name; he’s a brand synonymous with quality content and consistency. Known for his engaging channel “አቤል ብርሃኑ የወይኗ ልጅ”, Abel has become a household name in Ethiopia. In “የዩትዩብ ሚስጥሮች”, he distills years of experience into a step-by-step guide designed to help creators at all levels unlock the secrets to YouTube success. What the Book Covers Here are the key topics Abel explores in this 2025 edition: 1. Effortless Account Setup Learn how to create and optimize your YouTube and Google AdSense accounts. Abel breaks down the process into easy-to-follow steps, ensuring even beginners can get started without hassle. 2. Finding Trending Topics and Video Ideas Staying relevant is crucial for success on YouTube. Abel teaches readers how to spot trends and brainstorm video ideas that resonate with their target audience. 3. Planning and Scripting Your Videos Creating captivating content starts with solid preparation. Discover the secrets to crafting engaging scripts and structuring videos for maximum impact. 4. The Right Tools for the Job From cameras to editing software, Abel provides recommendations for budget-friendly and professional-grade tools to help you create high-quality videos. 5. Types of Content Explore various content formats, such as tutorials, vlogs, reviews, and more. Abel highlights how to select formats that suit your personality and audience preferences. 6. Expert Filming Advice Learn insider tips for filming, including lighting, sound, and camera angles, to make your videos stand out. 7. Finding Your Focus Discover how to choose a niche or theme that not only reflects your interests but also attracts and retains viewers. 8. Monetizing Your Channel Abel shares practical strategies for earning revenue through Google AdSense, sponsorships, memberships, affiliate marketing, and Patreon. Unlock the potential to turn your passion into profit. Who Is This Book For? This book is perfect for: Beginners looking to start their YouTube journey. Intermediate creators seeking to grow their channels. Anyone passionate about content creation and eager to learn from one of Ethiopia’s most successful YouTubers. Why It Stands Out What sets “የዩትዩብ ሚስጥሮች” apart is its localized approach. Written in Amharic, the book addresses challenges unique to Ethiopian creators, such as limited resources and market-specific strategies. Abel’s relatable writing style and real-world examples make the content both engaging and actionable. Final Thoughts “የዩትዩብ ሚስጥሮች” is more than just a guide—it’s a blueprint for success. Whether you’re dreaming of starting your own channel or looking to refine your existing one, this book is an invaluable resource. Abel Birhanu’s insights and proven strategies will inspire you to take the leap and build a thriving YouTube career. Don’t miss out on this opportunity to learn from one of Ethiopia’s biggest YouTube stars. Grab your copy of “የዩትዩብ ሚስጥሮች” today and start your journey to YouTube success!

title: አልፀፀትም
author: ጃዋር ሞሀመድ
description: አልፀፀትም (translated as "I Will Not Regret") is a profound and inspiring memoir by Jawar Mohammed, a transformative leader and one of the most influential advocates for democracy and human rights of our time. This remarkable book takes readers on an intimate journey through Jawar’s life, starting from his modest beginnings in the small town of Dumuga in Ethiopia's Oromia region to his emergence as a global voice for justice, equality, and democratic change. Through deeply personal reflections and powerful narratives, Jawar shares the challenges, sacrifices, and triumphs that shaped his unyielding commitment to fighting for a better future. አልፀፀትም stands as a testament to resilience, courage, and the pursuit of freedom. Currently available in both Afaan Oromo and Amharic, the memoir is set to reach a wider audience with its upcoming English translation, which is nearing completion. This is a must-read for anyone inspired by stories of transformative leadership and the fight for human rights.

title: የኤፌሶን ወንዝ
author: ዲአኮን ሄኖክ ሀኢለ
description: እንቅልፍ ሲበዛ የስንፍና ምልክት መሆኑ ሳይታለም የተፈታ ነው::

title: 37 አልፋ 73
author: ድር ሮዳስ ታደስሰ
description: Great news for book lovers! Megabe Haddis Dr. Rodas Tadesse’s 28th Book titled [37 Alpha 73] is out! Prepared in 4 chapters and 476 pages Alpha and Omega name of God’s formula in detail The heavenly formula of the world of angels and their names Including the book of Enoch, the scientific formulas written by early Ethiopian scholars under Alpha Light Tree of life From the abstract knowledge of light given to angels to the book of Raziel that Enoch learned The formula hidden in the periodic table, DNA, the 20 amino acids Including those in Pi, Phi, Fibionacci, it has been analyzed from the constellation to the version of the universe to the sub-atom. Enjoy Reading!

title: 5 ጉዳይ
author: በትህለሄም ታፈሰ
description: The Author, Bethlhem Tafesse is known for her hard talk on media, Betty LTV. This book will witness that she is a kind of person that even discloses the secrets of top profile people, those she had a discussion with. Another main issue the book raise is the unholy marriage between Jawar Mohammed and Lidetu Ayalew. The author has emphasized that Qeerroo is not created by Jawar. It was said that the killer of Baro Tumsa was Jara Aba Geda. But "5 Guday, 5 ጉዳይ" has multiplied this speculation by zero. Obo Lencho and Ato Jailu, who were there, gave the story as a witness. What is surprising is not the identity of the killer, but when Jara's name was mentioned along with the murder, why did the witnesses who are still alive, including Obo Lencho, remain silent? It is the question of most readers. Many more topics are included. Happy reading!

title: የሚሳም ተራራ
author: ፊክረማርኮስ ደስታ
description: Fikremarkos Desta gained acclaim for his ethnographic novels centered on the indigenous communities of southwestern Ethiopia. Transitioning from a background in chemistry at Addis Ababa University, he embarked on a successful writing career. His trilogy, exploring the intricacies of Hamar, Kwegu, and Arbore societies, has received widespread praise. And now he has brought his wonderful book “Yemisam Terara”, “የሚሳም ተራራ” which means “Kissable Mountain”, to his readers who have been eagerly waiting for years. In his autobiography, Fikremarkos narrates his life journey in a dramatic and beautiful language and shares his flashbacks (from Ethiopia to America) without missing a beat.

title: አልተዘዋወረችም
author: አለጥ አብረሀም
description: How can all Ethiopian citizen access the books while your plat form supports only credit card why not used other option for local markets such as Telebirr and other ways of purchasing methods

title: ይድረስ ለእቴቴ
author: ሳምራዊት ደበበ
description: አንዲት ሴት ለእቴቴ ለምትባል ወዳጇ የፃፈቻቸው የደብዳቤ ስብስብ ናቸው። በህይወቷ ስላጋጠማት ስለታዘበችው ስለተደሰተችበት ስለተከፋችበት ስልጅነቷ ስላላት ጥያቄዎች ለወዳጇ የፃፈችላት ደብዳቤዎች ስብስብ ናቸዉ ።

title: ሦሥተኛው ኪዳን
author: ደመዎዝ ጎሽመ
description: Best Amharic Philosophy book by Artist Demoz Goshme

title: ስድስተኛው ስሜት
author: ፊክሩ በለተ

description: በሐመር መጽሔትና በስምዐ ጽድቅ ጋዜጣ በሚጽፋቸው ጽሑፎቹ ይታወቃል፡፡ሦስት መንፈሳዊ መጻሕፍትን አሳትሟል፡፡ከመስከረም 2010 ዓ.ም ጀምሮ በቃል አምባ መጽሔት ሃይማኖታዊ፤ታሪካዊና ማኅበራ ነገሮችን“ በምን ታዘቡ ”ና“ እናገራለሁ”ዓምድ በቋሚነት ይጽፋል፡፡በhttps://hamernoah.wordpress.com/ብሎግ በዓለም ለሚገኙ ከ28,971 በላይ ለሚሆኑ አንባቢያን ልዩ ልዩ ጽሑፎችን ያስነብባል፡፡

description: The "Our Father" prayer (አባታችን ሆይ ጸሎት), also known as the Lord's Prayer, is one of the most well-known and widely recited Christian prayers. It holds significant importance in Orthodox Catholic and Protestant traditions and is often considered a model for how believers should approach God in prayer. The prayer is derived from the teachings of Jesus Christ and is found in the New Testament of the Bible, specifically in the books of Matthew (Matthew 6:9-13) and Luke (Luke 11:2-4).

title: መንግስታት ለምን ይወድቃሉ
author: አያለው ሚቲኩ ቢሩ
description: "Why Nations Fail" by Daron Acemoglu and James A. Robinson argues that the key determinant of a nation's success or failure lies in its institutions. Nations with inclusive institutions, which promote political participation, protect property rights, and offer economic opportunities for the majority, tend to prosper and develop. In contrast, nations with extractive institutions, concentrating power and wealth in the hands of a few, face economic stagnation and political repression. The book emphasizes historical events and powerful elites' influence in shaping institutions and provides numerous case studies to illustrate its point. Ultimately, the authors stress the significance of establishing inclusive institutions to foster sustainable economic and political growth in societies.

title: መናፍቁ ካህሊል እና ሌሎች
author: ሙሉከን ታሪኩ
description: "The Prophet" by Khalil Gibran is a deeply philosophical and spiritual work that consists of 26 poetic essays. The book is structured around the central figure of Almustafa, a prophet who has spent twelve years in the city of Orphalese. As he prepares to depart and return to his homeland, he is approached by the people of the city, who seek his wisdom on various aspects of life. Each chapter of the book addresses a different theme, and through Almustafa's responses, Gibran imparts his profound insights and reflections on these subjects. The themes covered include love, marriage, children, work, joy, sorrow, freedom, friendship, and more. In the chapter on love, Gibran explores the multifaceted nature of love, describing it as a powerful force that enriches and nourishes the soul. He emphasizes the importance of giving oneself fully to love and allowing it to lead to greater understanding and compassion. In the chapter on marriage, Gibran delves into the idea of two individuals coming together in a union of love and freedom. He stresses the significance of maintaining one's individuality within the relationship and supporting each other's growth. "The Prophet" also discusses the concept of self-knowledge, urging individuals to look within themselves to find answers and discover their own truths. Gibran emphasizes the interconnectedness of life and the importance of embracing both joy and sorrow as integral parts of the human experience. Throughout the book, Gibran's writing style combines Eastern mysticism with Western philosophy, resulting in a poetic and captivating narrative that resonates with readers on a deeply spiritual level. His words evoke a sense of timelessness, and the themes explored in "The Prophet" continue to be relevant and meaningful to readers from diverse cultural backgrounds and beliefs.

description: ይህ መጽሐፍ በቅዱስ ኤፍሬም ዙሪያ ከእንግሊዘኛ ወደ አማርኛ ከተመለሱ መጻሕፍት አንዱና ምናልባትም የመጀመሪያው ሊሆን ይችላል፡፡ ይህ ትርጉም በ2003 ዓ.ም ለመጀመሪያ ጊዜ ተተርጉሞ ለአንባቢያን የቀረበ ሲሆን ከዚያ በኋላ አንድ ጊዜ ታትሞአል፡፡
