title: መሆን
author: ሚቸለ ኦባማ ትራስንስላተድ ብይ ተስፋጺኦን ጋሻነህ
author_romanized: Michele Obama trasnslated by Tesfatsion Gashaneh
description: "Becoming" is a memoir written by Michelle Obama, the former First Lady of the United States. Published in 2018, the book provides an intimate and introspective look into Obama's life, from her childhood in Chicago to her time in the White House. The memoir is divided into three parts, each highlighting significant stages of Obama's life. In the first part, "Becoming Me," she shares her upbringing in a working-class neighborhood, her family dynamics, and the experiences that shaped her identity and values. Obama reflects on the importance of education, her early career, and the challenges she faced as an African-American woman in various professional settings. The second part, "Becoming Us," delves into her relationship with Barack Obama, their marriage, and the balancing act of raising a family while pursuing demanding careers. She provides insights into their journey together, the ups and downs of political life, and the support they provided to one another. Finally, in "Becoming More," Obama narrates her experiences as the First Lady of the United States. She shares her efforts to use her position to advocate for issues close to her heart, such as education, health, and military families. Obama reflects on the personal sacrifices and public scrutiny that accompanied her role, as well as the impact she made during her time in the White House. Throughout the memoir, Obama offers candid reflections on her personal and professional growth, her values, and the lessons she has learned along the way. She emphasizes the importance of staying true to oneself, embracing authenticity, and using one's voice to make a positive difference in the world.

title: ሌቱም አይነጋልኝ
author: ሲብሀት ገብረግዚአብሄር
description: Sibhat fearlessly exposes himself by assuming the role of a character in his book, Wube Bereha, where he candidly recounts his wild party lifestyle and encounters with prostitutes. Surprisingly, the younger generation in Ethiopia embraces the book, appreciating its frankness. In addition to his written works, Sibhat gains notoriety through his controversial interviews with various journalists. This unique quality has made him a beloved figure among both older and younger Ethiopian generations. Notably, the book was translated into French in 2004. It's important to note that the book contains explicit language and content that may be considered taboo in our society. Therefore, it is strongly advised that only mature audiences engage with it.

title: ሌላው የኢትዮጵያ ታሪክ ገፅታ
author: ተሾመ ቢርሀኑ ከማል

author: ሪጭክ ዋርረን ትራንስላተድ ብይ በራኑ በላቸው
author_romanized: Rick Warren Translated by Beranu Belachew
description: Warren starts by addressing the question of why we exist, emphasizing that life is not a result of chance but rather a deliberate creation by God. He outlines five foundational purposes that he believes encompass the reason for our existence: worship, fellowship, discipleship, ministry, and mission. Throughout the book, Warren explores various aspects of these purposes and provides practical guidance on how to apply them in daily life. He encourages readers to develop a closer relationship with God through prayer, Bible study, and regular worship. He emphasizes the importance of building meaningful relationships with others and participating in a community of faith. The book also delves into the process of self-discovery, helping readers identify their unique gifts, talents, and passions. Warren explains how these attributes can be used to serve others and make a positive impact in the world. He encourages readers to pursue personal growth and develop a character that aligns with their purpose. Furthermore, "The Purpose Driven Life" addresses common challenges and roadblocks that can hinder individuals from fulfilling their purpose, such as fear, envy, and unhealed relationships. Warren provides insights and practical advice on overcoming these obstacles and living a life of integrity and purpose.

title: ኃይለሥላሴ አነሳሳቸው፣ አወዳደቃቸው
author: ሀግጋኢ እርሊች ትራንስላተድ ብይ ሄዋን ሲሞን
author_romanized: Haggai Erlich Translated by Hewan Simon
description: Despite the lack of consensus among scholars regarding Ethiopia's Haile Selassie, fundamental questions persist: Who was Haile Selassie? How did he manage to survive for over fifty years? And how did he end up as a de facto exile in his own country, only to be eventually assassinated as the last emperor in a centuries-old dynasty? Haggai Erlich's book on Haile Selassie offers an abundance of fresh perspectives and profound insights that greatly contribute to our comprehension of this remarkable ruler. By incorporating newly uncovered archival sources and drawing upon extensive research on Ethiopia spanning several decades, Erlich presents a nuanced and at times tragic account, illuminating not only the life of an individual but also the complex narrative of modern Ethiopia within its domestic and global context.

title: ኃያል የመሆን መንገድ
author: አንትሆንይ ሮብቢንስ ትራንስላተድ ብይ ጸጋየ ሺንበር
author_romanized: Anthony Robbins translated by Tsegaye Shinber
description: "Unlimited Power: The New Science of Personal Achievement" is a self-help book written by Anthony Robbins, a renowned motivational speaker and life coach. The book, published in 1986, aims to empower readers with practical strategies and techniques to take control of their lives and achieve their goals. Robbins introduces the concept of neuro-linguistic programming (NLP), a psychological approach that explores the connection between language, thought patterns, and behavior. He explains how individuals can reprogram their minds by changing their language patterns and beliefs, ultimately transforming their lives. Throughout the book, Robbins discusses various aspects of personal development, including mastering emotions, building rapport with others, setting goals, and creating lasting change. He emphasizes the importance of taking responsibility for one's actions and decisions, as well as adopting a mindset of continuous growth and learning. Robbins also delves into the power of modeling, suggesting that by studying successful individuals and emulating their strategies and behaviors, one can achieve similar levels of success. He shares numerous anecdotes and case studies to illustrate his points and provides practical exercises for readers to apply the concepts discussed. Additionally, "Unlimited Power" addresses the significance of physical health and vitality in achieving personal and professional success. Robbins offers insights into nutrition, exercise, and other lifestyle factors that can contribute to overall well-being and enhance one's performance.

author: መምሂር ሺመሊስ መርጊአ
description: ልጃቸውን ዮሐንስ ብለው ጠሩት፣ ወላጅ አባቱ ዮሐንስ ጨቅላ ሕጻን ሳለ ዐረፈ፡፡ በጊዜውም ገና የ፳ ዓመት ወጣት የነበረችው እናቱ አትናሲያ ልጇን ዮሐንስን በክርስቲያናዊ ሥነ ምግባር ኮትኩቶ የማሳደግ ኃላፊነት በእርሷ ጫንቃ ላይ ወደቀ፡፡

title: ስምንተኛዋ ቀንና  ሌሎችም
author: መምሂር ሺመሊስ መርጊአ
description: የአጻጻፍ ስለቱ የሚያዘነብለው ወደ ሴማዊው ትውፊት ሲሆን ይህም በአብዛኛው በጸሎት የተጀመረ ወይም የተቋጨ ወይም የጸሎት ይዘት ያለውና ኪናዊ የሆነ አቀራረብ የሚታይበት ስልት ነው፡፡

title: የመደመር ትውልድ
author: አቢይ አህመድ አሊ
description: It is not a revolution that has created Generation Medemer. It has not been created as a result of the imposition of the ideas and interest of few individuals or change agents. It is a generation that is striving to find its own way and choose what is in its best interest. This is a generation in which a major political transition has been caused by popular pressure or protest in collaboration with elements within the political elite. However, this process of transition and change has its own shortcomings. This movement is still in search of its ultimate direction and common overarching objectives that would be acceptable to all. It is a process in which instead of mimicking the revolutionary tone of previous transitions in where everything is subjected to radical change, a more reformist and incremental approach has been adopted. The future of our children and grandchildren is going to be determined by how we handle the opportunity we have in our hands right now. It is the sacred duty of this generation to pass on a positive legacy to the next generation, by sowing seeds of goodness and containing the weeds of hate and division from our past.

title: አልነጃሺ
author: ሞሀምመድ ሀስሳን መንጊስቱ
description: በአላህ ስም እጅግ በጣም ሩህሩህ በጣም አዛኝ በሆነው፤ ያአ’ላህ ሰላምና ሰላምታ በመደምደሚያው ነብይ ላይ እና በቤተሰቦቻቸው፣ በባልደረቦቻቸው እንዲሁም እስከ እለተ ቂያማ (ትንሳኤ) ቀን ድረስ ፈለጋቸውን በተከተሉት ላይ ሁሉ ይሁን፣ አሚን!።

title: እስረኞቹ
author: እንዳለገታ ከበደ
description: ግለሰቡ ሲያስበው የነበረው ሃሳብ ብቻም አይደለም፡፡ አሳሪውም ታሳሪ ነው፤ <ደግሞ መጡብኝ> ብሎ ራሱን አሳስሮ የተገኘ . . .በነጻነት የተገለጸውን ሃሳብ ምን መዘዝ ያስከትልብኝ ይሆን? ብሎ በመሳቀቅ ዘመኑን የፈጀ . . . እና

title: ምህዳራዊ አስተሳሰብ ለዘላቂ ሃገራዊ መፍትሔ
author: ደስታ መብራቱ
description: የ1960ዎቹ ትውልድ እምነት እና ጽናት ዋነኛው ምንጭ በወቅቱ የነበረውን ድህነት፣ ኋላቀርነት፣ ጭቆና እና አድልዎ ‘ለምን’ ብሎ መጠየቁ እና ሁኔታውን ለመቀየር ቆርጦ መነሳቱ ነበር። ከዚህ ጋር ተያይዞ በየትኛውም ወገን ለተከፈለው መስዋአትነት ታላቅ ክብር አለኝ።

title: ሀገር ያጣ ሞት
author: ሄኖክ በከለ ለማ
description: አንዳንድ ታሪኮች ርእስ የላቸውም - ተነግረው እንዳልተነገሩ ይረሳሉ።አንዳንድ ሰዎች ስም የላቸውም - ኖረው እንዳልኖሩ።አንዳድ ገድሎች አልተዘከሩም - የባከኑ መሥዋዕትነቶች ይባላሉ። አንዳንድ ቅሌቶች ሰው ፊት አልታዩም - እንዳልተፈፀሙ ሁሉ በጨለማ ውስጥ ይቀራሉ።

title: ዒላማህን ምታ
author: ማህደር ተስፋየ
description: ማንኛውም የላቀ አስተሳሰብ ያለው ሰው መለያ አንድን ነገር ከመሥራቱ ወይም ካለመሥራቱ አስቀድሞ ውጤቱን የመገንዘብ ችሎታው ነው። አንድ ሥራ ለአንተ ወይንም ለድርጅትህ በእርግጥ ምን ያህል ጠቃሚ እንደሆነ ለማወቅ ይህንን ሥራ መሥራት ወይም አለመሥራት የሚያስከትለውን ውጤት አስቀድሞ መረዳት አስፈላጊ ነው።

title: አዕምሮን ማሳደግ
author: ድር ጫሮል ስ ድወጭክ
description: በዓለም አቀፍ ደረጃ በሚሊዮኖች ቅጂ የተሸጠው “MINDSET” መጽሐፍ በአማርኛ የተተረጎመውም መጽሐፍ ተወዳጅነትን አግኝቶ በተደጋጋሚ እየታተመ ነው ። በ DR CAROL S.DWECK ተጽፎ በቴዎድሮስ ተረፈ “አዕምሮን ማሳደግ” በሚል ርዕስ ተተርጉሟል ። ይህ መጽሐፍ ከ 2007 ጀምሮ በተደጋጋሚ በመታተም እየተነበበ ነው ።

title: ክሂሎት
author: ድር በከር ሻለ
description: መሪዎች የሕዝብ ጽኑ ድጋፍ ካላቸው ፣ ጠንክረው ኃላፊነታቸውን በመወጣት በሚሰጡት ውጤታማ አመራር የበኩላቸውን ታሪካዊ አሻራ አሳርፈው ያልፋሉ ። በሂደቱም ፤ በትውልድ ቅብብሎች ተደማሪና ተከታታይ ዕድገትና ለውጥ ይመጣል። ዘመናትንም የሚሻገሩ ለውጦች ያለማቋረጥ ይመዘገባሉ።

title: ቤተ-እስራኤል ከትናንት እስከ ዛሬ
author: አምሳሉ መሀሪ
description: ቤተ እስራኤል ከትናንት እስከ ዛሬ እንደ ርዕሱ መጠሪያ ሁሉ የማሕበረሰቡን እምነት፣ ባሕልና ወግ፣ መንፈሳዊና ዘመናዊ ትምህርት፣ የፍቅረ ኢየሩሳሌም ራእይና ኅልም እውነታን በስፋትና በጥልቀት የሚያትት መጽሐፍ ነው።

title: ንጹር ፍቅር
author: መኮንነን መዘሚር
description: ኢቮሉሽን ድንቅ ነው። ኢቮሉሽን ብሩህ እና አስደናቂ ሥራ ሠርቷል። እኛን ሰዎችን የመሰለ ኅሊና ያለን፣ የምንወድ የምንጠላ፣ የምንደሰት የምናዝን፣ በስሜት የምንበረታ የምንደክም፣ ተስፋ የምናደርግ ተስፋ የምንቆርጥ፣ እንቅልፍ የምንተኛ የምንነቃ፣ የምንፈርድ ፍርድ የምንቀበል፣ የምናስተውል የምንዘናጋ፣ የታላላቅ ቴክኖሎጂ ፈጠራ ችሎታ ያለን፣ ለእራሳችን ብቻ ሳይሆን ለሌሎች መብት የምንቆረቆር፣ በአጠቃላይ እኛን ሰዎችን የፈጠረን ኢቮሉሽን ከሆነ በእውነት ሊደነቅ ይገባዋል።

title: ምሰሶዋ
author: ሄለን እሸቱ
description: በግል ሕይወት ዙሪያ የሚጻፉ መጻሕፍት ለመማር ሕይወትን ለማሰላሰል በእጅጉ ይጠቅማሉ። ለዚህ ነው ከእለት እለት በርካታ በግል ሕይወት ዙሪያ የሚያወጉ መጻሕፍት እየበረከቱ የመጡበት ምክንያት እየበረከቱ የመጡበት ምክንያት ከእንደዚህ አይነት እውነተኛ የግል ሕይወት ታኢክ የሚገኘው ትምህርት ጥቅሙ ብዙ ስለሆነ ነው።

title: ፓርቲው - የኢሕአፓን የአላማ ፣ ስትራቴጂ እና የታክቲክ ጉዞ ውጣ ውረድ
title_romanized: pārtiw - yaʼiḥʼapān yaʼalāmā ፣ strātéǧi ʼenā yatāktik guzo wṭā wrad
author: ዎልደ ለኡል ካስሳ
description: ደራሲው ወልደ ልዑል ካሣ በ 1960 ዎቹ የኢትዮጵያ ተማሪዎች ንቅናቄ በትጋት ተሳትፏል ። ከዚያም በኢሕአፓና በኢሕአሠ ውስጥ በአባልነት በጽኑ ታግሏል።

title: የትዳር ወግ
author: ተዛዙ ካስሳ
description: “ከሦስት ዓመት በፊት ዕድሜያቸው በሠላሳዎቹ ያሉ ባለጠጋ የሚባሉ ጥንዶች ለምክር ወደ እኔ ይመጣሉ።ከተጋቡ ገና ሁለት ዓመት አልሞላቸውም።ከጋብቻ በፊትም ብዙም አይተዋወቁም።ፍቅር ጠናብን ብለው በችኮላ ነው ሰርጉንም ያጣደፉት።

description: I am deeply saddened to hear that Alemahehu Eshete, who was a role model for many of those who loved his country and worked for it with all his heart, passed away. Dr. Abiy Ahmed (Prime Minister of the Federal Republic of)

title: በራስ የመተማመን ኃይል
author: ሱራፈል ጊርማ
description: Even if you don't learn anything from this book, remember this: Confidence, like any skill, is a mental skill that can be developed through practice. Taken from the most successful lives and traits alive today, proven to be effective through extensive scientific research and experience, if you follow these actionable guidelines, you can develop the confidence to achieve anything you truly desire. Many methods, ideas and alternative actions are presented in this book. You can always use these methods. However, you can't just read the book once and turn away. You should take ten to fifteen minutes every morning to practice your self-confidence. In this way, when you believe in yourself, love yourself, and have the healthy mindset to gracefully accept your weaknesses and past failures, your life will improve dramatically. "Before you can have anything, you must first be something yourself."

author: ድር እውነቱ ሀኢሉ
description: መጽሀፉ በተለያዩ ተግዳራቶች ታጥረው ላሉ ሁሉ በትዕግስት ወደ ሚፈልጉት የስኬት ጥግ እንዲደርሱ ጥሩ ተሞክሮ ይሰጣል።

title: የተዳፈነው ታሪክ ራስ ጉግሣ ወሌ
author: በሁሉም አለበል
description: The book presents the history of Ethiopia following the modern and traditional style of writing. As a modern approach, the author has done very diligent research. That is, she told the story by going to the place where the story took place, seeing the scenery of the place again and again, and asking the relatives of the storyteller and the local elders again and again. Secondly, as much as possible, as a traditional approach to history, she combined the events that took place with the poems, jokes and sayings of the time. Overall, I believe that this book, with its comprehensive analysis and painstaking research, as well as its literary beauty and imaginative presentation, will entice readers who love history to eagerly read it. I want to thank the writer for this. Dr. Dangachew Assefa (Philosophy teacher and researcher at Addis Ababa University)

title: ጃግማ ኬሎ የበጋው መብረቅ
author: ፊክረማርኮስ ደስታ
description: አስራ ሰባት ግዜ ቀዶ ህክምና ሲደረግለት በጥንካሬ የማለዳዋን ጀንበር ለማየት ይጏጏ የነበረው ጀግና፣ ዘለዓለም እንደሚኖር ሁሌም የሚያስበው ጃጌ ጃግማ ....ዛሬም በህይወት አለ።

title: ጀምሮ መጨረስ በንቃት የመጀመርና በብቃት የመጨረስ ስልቶች
title_romanized: ǧamro maċaras banqāt yamaǧamarnā babqāt yamaċaras sltoč
author: ድር እዮብ ማሞ
description: Briefly translated, "life" means "starting and ending". This life that started when we were conceived and born from our mother's womb, whether we live it properly or not, it is bound to end one day. Everything in this lifetime is subject to this law. Personal life, family life, friendship life, academic life, love life, marriage life, work life, business life. . . Life! . . . It starts! It will end! The life that has been handed to us in the form of a trust once started, we lead forward and end according to the quality pattern created by the choices we make every day. These choices motivate us to embark on different journeys. The important thing is not only to start something, but to continue what has been started and to finish it effectively. Therefore, it is necessary to develop the motivation to start, the ability to continue, and to develop a strategy to finish it efficiently.

title: የአዲስ አበባ ውበቶች ቅጽ ፩
author: እፍረም ባደግ
description: የአቢሲኒያ ባንክ ሲመሠረት አንድ መቶ ሺህ አክሲዮን ታትሞ አንዱ በአምሳ ብር ነበር የሚሸጠው። ከባንኩ ተበድረው ብድራቸውንም መክፈል ያቃታቸውን ኢትዮጵያዊያን ደግሞ ለውጭ ዜጎች ተቋቁሞ በነበረ ፍርድ ቤት ከሰው ያስፈርዱባቸው ነበር ብለው ያትታሉ።

title: የልጄ ስኬት
author: አሰፋች ሀኢለሲላስሴ
description: A psychology book called "Yelje Skeet" means “The success of my child”, prepared by the psychologist Asefach Haileslase, which contains knowledge and guidance on how life should be led from love relationship to having a child and raising a child, has been republished and is enough for reading. It is a book that is read in 204 pages. It is known that the expert has currently opened a center called "Bezna" and does counseling and training in psychology, leadership skills, professional skills and related issues.

title: አይቻልም
author: ነጋሽ አበበ
description: Preparing test for our brain improves the capacity and functioning of our brain. When the brain is exposed to new and unprecedented challenges, new cells are formed in the brain and brain capacity improves along the way. For example, when we play a game that we have never played before, the part of our brain that controls and controls the game causes new cells to grow and new communication networks to be established between cells.

description: This book prepared by Master Girma Batu is one of the important books in this regard. It is a good book written with knowledge gathered from many historical sources, from showing the direction of how our understanding of history should be. I sincerely thank Master Germa Batu for providing us with this book and hope that he will continue to provide us with other books in the future." D/n Yaegal Abegaz

title: የሬጌው ንጉስ በኢትዮጵያ - እዮብ መኮንን
author: ሳሙእል ወልደየስ
description: በዚህ መፅሐፍ ውስጥ ሙዚቀኛው እዮብ ምን ያክል እንደ ማናውቀው እና ከሙዚቃው ውጭ ያለ ሕይወቱን የሚዳስስ ድንቅ መፅሐፍ ነው። A book about famous Ethiopian Singer, Eyob Mamo

title: አመኔታ
author: ድር እዮብ ማሞ
description: The big picture:- In a society where trust reigns, even if you say something wrong and do something wrong, the society will show you incredible patience. On the contrary, a society in the midst of insecurity is a society that can be seen picking and touching small things. There is no situation where such a minority community does not get "things". Why what was said was said, why what was not said was kept silent; It has nothing to do with why what was done was done, and why what was not done was not done. If the members of the society need to look beyond the small and petty issues and look at the bigger social picture, trust is the main issue. This is the big social picture, which includes unity, love, peace, prosperity and progress.

title: የፍቅር ሕይወት
author: ድር እዮብ ማሞ
description: A significant number of unmarried people, after carefully exploring the beginning of their love with a person, knowing that for various reasons, this person's behavior, attitude and lifestyle do not suit them, they ignore this inconsistency and push forward. The result of this negligence is only known when they reach a point where they realize that they cannot get out easily. Passionate love between two opposite sexes can have a sexualizing effect by seeing the difference between them and what can happen through that difference. This influence has the potential to make lovers look at the process of marriage only from the point of view of their love and focus only on getting married. However, there is no doubt that relationships can falter without the strength of our balance when challenged by some of the life and relationship tensions of today's hot romance that makes us neglect the importance of balance.

title: እንዳትጋቡ
author: ሱራፈል ኪዳነ
description: I am very happy to have the opportunity to comment on this amazing book that has so much substance in it. It would probably make me the first woman to comment on her husband's book. There is no one better than me to talk about the identity of the writer and his marital status. Marriage is a great institution. We have spent sixteen bad and good years in this honorable institution with my dear husband who has given this book to you with a lot of effort. The God has given us two children. Marriage is difficult, it requires great knowledge and patience. We have lived together for so many years because we have been able to overcome the challenges that separate us every day. Surafel is not only my husband but also a teacher, friend and brother and the best father to my children. You will get great knowledge from this book, both unmarried and married people. Good reading. title: ያልተነበበው አንባቢ አቶ ነጋሽ ባልቻ
author: አንዷለም አራገ
description: The book is a book that commemorates the battle of one of the entrepreneurs that many of us forget when we celebrate heroes. Negash Balcha is the owner of Bethlehem Plaza located in the heart of Megenanga. Mr. Negash is one of the national heroes who achieved great success from nothing. In the words of the author, this person is an "unread reader" in addition to being an investor. Andulam was inspired by their story and decided to write while they were still alive. He gave them a long interview and started the article, then he died suddenly. But he pushed the beginning and wrote a book that brings his history alive. I have heard from the author that Mr. Negash was a permanent supporter of the Macedonian Center for the Elderly during his lifetime, and that the proceeds from book sales will be used for the Macedonian Center. Befikadu BehayluThe book is a book that commemorates the battle of one of the entrepreneurs that many of us forget when we celebrate heroes. Negash Balcha is the owner of Bethlehem Plaza located in the heart of Megenanga. Mr. Negash is one of the national heroes who achieved great success from nothing. Befikadu Hailu

title: የቃሉ ሀይል
author: ዮሀንነስ ዎርኪነህ
description: Bible; It is a letter written by God to bring mankind into life. The word of God. It is the key to human life. The power of the word. It takes faith and grace to be revealed. When the angel of God closes the door, it is never thought to study the word and make it a life lesson. It is not possible. Now is the time to obey His Word. Because we will receive the price tomorrow. God's intentions for mankind are clearly stated in His Word. Since ancient times, the word has been revealed by different people, bringing the generation to know Jesus. To get life. Bible; It is a divine and eternal message. Everyone who says I am a Christian, everyone who wants to know Christianity; By studying the word of God, he can find an adequate answer to the question that arises. As such, Injured by the wrong person; He can go back to the truth of the Bible and understand the difference between minister and service. Yohannes Workineh

title: አመራር A to Z
author: ድር እዮብ ማሞ
description: A leader who lacks basic knowledge is always supported by the knowledge of other people and does not even have the basic ability to evaluate the effectiveness of the work he is doing. Most of the time, such leaders come to leadership not because of their competence, but because of an agenda that is outside of the main purpose of the institution. Furthermore, they come to leadership through a system that is not biased or openly competitive. If we talk about the relationship between knowledge and influence, it is important to remember the expression of the following four types of people, extracted from an ancient saying.

title: የጨው ዘር
author: ደመከ አዳሙ አዳል
description: This book reminds us of the characters: the efforts to shape the facts through the events: the reflections: the contradictions in the events have an unforgettable quality. Dr. Akalu Getaneh A. Ayu

title: አደፍርስ
author: ዳኒአቸው ዎርኩ
description: He is a literary man who tried, created and created a new method in Ethiopian literature. Unlike other literary men, literature was not only his soul's calling and natural gift. He studied literature up to a master's degree and applied the techniques in his works. In this way, he is different from the authors of the time: Hadis Alemayehu, Abe Gubenga, Haile Gerima and other literary figures; His did not write only in Amharic; He also gained fame for his works in English. His book 'The Thirteenth Sun', published in 1973, captivated the Western world and was widely read in Portuguese, German and Chinese. His father, Ato Warku Zhabh was a progressive man ahead of his time. New horizon newspaper

title: የአረቦችና የእስራኤል የ6ቱ ቀን ጦርነት
author: ትራንስላተድ ማሞ ዉዲነህ
description: When Israel had 80 hours left to start the war, the division of labor made by the Israeli people was enough to show a war preparation that the world had never seen. In May 1987, Israel had an army of fifty thousand to eighty thousand. During the entire campaign, however, it was confirmed that two hundred and sixty-four thousand troops could be deployed. After each 30 months of service in the Israeli military, they become reservists. This is until they reach 35 years of age. The officers who are assigned to the reserve are trained in military training for thirty-two or fifty-eight days a year. As Israel is an example of a democratic country in the world, its women are quickly called up for military service when necessary. According to Israeli law, a woman must serve 18 months in the military.

title: በእኔ ቤት
author: በረከት ዘላለም
description: Bereket Zelema holds a Bachelor of Arts degree in Journalism and Communication from Addis Ababa University and a Master's degree in Social Work from the same university and is currently working in both fields. On the other side of his life, he is serving the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church in the title of Diacon, and he is doing research on the formation of Zema Yitbahal (Method) together with different scholars. And now, he has matured the reality of the world he lived in with his first novel.

title: ቴሎስ ሜሎሪና ክፍል ሁለት
author: ናሁሰናይ ጸዳሉ አበራ
description: “Of course, we came to this world because the world wanted us, not because we wanted it. But how we live is decided by us and our environment. The greatest way to live is not to live as we want, but to live as we are wanted by the earth. There are billions of people on this earth. The Creator did not create anyone without a reason. Everyone was created to live happily on this earth to do good deeds. Our life is measured by the purpose of our life, not by the number of years we live”

title: ኢስላማዊ ሥነጽሑፍ
author: ተሾመ ቢርሀኑ ከማል
description: When you read this book, you will learn about the inspiration and development of Islamic literature, the meaning of Islamic literature, the general aspect of Islamic literature, the golden age of Islamic literature, great Muslim writers, Manzuma / Neshida / Madh, Zikr, the study of the Qur'an, the translation of the Qur'an, the publication of the Qur'an and They will read about the literary form and beauty seen in the Qur'an, about the Luh (Luh), about the presence of the Qur'an in Geez, Amharic, Tigrinya and to some extent Oromo, about the translation of the Qur'an in Ethiopia, about Islamic journalism, about life history writing, about the love of art. You will find that some topics are designed to be useful.

title: ወድቆ የተገኘው መጽሐፍ
author: የማሪአምዎርክ ተሻገር
description: The author's technique of telling the real story like a dream and the use of language that is not boring is so amazing that he has the ability to hold the readers by inspiration and force. Maryamavit, the main character of the novel, is explored as a complete representation of the author's true story, except for her gender and sexual temptations.

title: ቃና ዘገሊላ
author: ዲአኮን ሄኖክ ሀኢለ
description: Among the many miracles that our Lord performed, our church celebrates the miracle of Cana in Galilee. What is the reason that she made the miracle of Cana to be celebrated as one of our Lord's sub-celebrations without celebrating the day on which he healed Meggu, raised Lazarus from the dead, enlightened his eyes, and freed those held captive by demons? Does the mere fact that a man makes water into wine at his marriage with a woman really make the church celebrate it as the feast of the Lord? not at all! Saint John wrote extensively about this wedding, and our holy church celebrates the feast of Cana in Galilee, "God who can do all things made six barrels of water into wine!" It's not because the story of this wedding house contains a deep secret that explains the salvation and heavenly glory of mankind.

title: የፀሓይ ከተማ
author: ድር መስከረም ለቺሳ
description: The book clears up the main historical and political confusions of our past and present eras and reminds us of forgotten spiritual facts. The following topics are explored in the book: - Who is the "City of the Sun"? - What kind of people were the Axumites? - The chaos of the 16th century Italian Renaissance: Why are they now similar to us? - Aksum civilization: What good contribution did it make to the Italian Renaissance? - Femininity, virginity, masculinity, bravery... What was it like in the eyes of the Aksumites? - What is "Hermeticism"? - Who are Dekik Stephen? - What is the true purpose of modern education? - What shape does the mission of the Jesuits take in the modern world? - Why don't we always talk to Egypt? - What is a "Republic"? - What is the connection between some of the western international aid organizations that we know now and "Prester John"? - The conflict between Babylon and Zion: What does it look like in the 21st century? .... and: more!

title: ሐዋዝ
author: ከፈለንግ ዘለላው
description: You can't take it back and you won't live for the day you spent. Saying "I have" will not help you. Try to live with it, not with it. Give honor to what is in your hand, not to what has come and gone. Make the biggest sacrifice today for the highest profits of all time. The time you fought for does not make you a loser. Focus on what you can change. You can't change who you are today, not yesterday. Don't miss out on baking the bread of hope in an unknown tomorrow. Don't poison your today with someone who is not with you and is with you in a wasted day called yesterday.

title: የአለቃ ገብረሃና ምርጥ ምርጥ ቀልዶች
author: አረፈአይነ ሀጎስ
description: የመጀመርያ ትምህርታቸውን በአካባቢው ከቀሰሙ በኋላ ወደ ጎጃም ተሻግረው ቅኔን ተቀኙ። ከዚያም ወደ ጎንደር ከተማ ተመልሰው ከመምሕር ወደ አብ ወልደ ማርያም ጽዋትወ ዜማ፤ ከባሕታዊ ገብረ አምላክ አቋቋም፤ ከዐቃቤ ስብሃት ገብረ መድሕን ትርጓሜ መጽሐፍትን እንዲሁም ድጓን ተምረዋል። በእዚህ የሰፋ እውቀታቸው የተነሣ በ26 ዓመታቸው ጎንደር ሊቀካህናትነት ተሾመው ነበር።

title: ኢትዮጵያዊ ሀገሩ የት ነው?
author: እስከዳር ጊርማይ
description: "...In fact, commemorating Adwan in Addis Ababa without him is no less than replacing the statue of Emperor Menelik with a picture of a leader who was not there during the war. Celebrating Adwa without Emperor Menelik is considered to be like turning the bride away from the wedding, the festival cannot be complete without Adwan separated from the king. Indeed, it is possible to dislike or criticize Emperor Menelik. However, celebrating Adwan on the day of the ceremony by denigrating him is leaving another story for future generations and declaring our defeat in public on the day of our victory. And because the father-in-law will feel bad about the holiday without them, it will be difficult to hear and follow the call of this year.

title: "የሶሻሊስቱ ጠንቋይ ጉዳይ"
author: ሀማ ቱማ ትራንስላተድ ብይ ሂዎት ታደስሰ
author_romanized: Hama Tuma Translated by Hiwot Tadesse
description: "Life is one long procession. From birth to death, you stand in a procession with a plate of food and a basket of bread. You either get it or you don't. The procession is an art, it is a science, it has its own philosophy, its own dialectic and political economy. And in this sophisticated art, it is one of the more fortunate revolutionary and No one is more skilled than the citizens of socialist countries." The book is divided into two parts: - In part one: - The heroic whipper, the socialist witch, the rally breaker, the unshakable author, the pursuer of lust, etc... In Part Two: Fireside Traditions, Revenge, Betrayal, The Death of the Breaker, The Professional, Waldiba’s Story, etc., he will read us short, wonderful texts.

title: ውብ
author: ደስሴ አዳም
description: "The biggest challenge is not to become a man, but to live as a man!" "What we think is precious in life is not what we have, but what we have lost!" "Your biggest enemy in life is your bad thoughts!" "It is difficult for a person to pick up the fallen, but it does not mean that we are strong." "In your life, you will be tempted by people and yourself without thinking. Some temptations will be beyond you, even if you want to run away, you can't. If you don't fight with your heart and overcome them, they will follow you wherever you go. So stop! You can't avoid temptation except from people by fighting and running away..."

title: የአንቀጸ ብርሃን አንድምታ ትረጓሜ
author: መመሂር ሀኢለማሪአም ዘዉዱ
description: Saint Ephraim described the Syrian scriptures as follows. A man can drink as much as he wants and can, but he will not finish the well. Others who come after him can also drink and record. The former for the latter. And it will not end for the one who comes after him. This means that the scholars of the holy books are given to them in every era, feed them, and translate them; However, they understand and explain as much as they can, but they do not finish the mystery. The main principle and basis of interpretation is to be interpreted by keeping the doctrine of the Apostolic and Orthodox Church. Beyond this, interpretation is limited by time, and it was in this era, but it is not said that it does not exist in this era. God's Word is an inexhaustible source from which new mysteries always spring forth.

title: ቤት - አልባ ዶክተሮችና ሌሎች ፖለቲካዊ ፣ ኢኮኖሚያዊ ማኅበራዊ ጉዳዮች
title_romanized: bét - ʼalbā doktaročnā léloč polatikāwi ፣ ʼikonomiyāwi māhbarāwi gudāyoč
author: ጸጋ ሲለሺ
description: This book presents the challenging arguments of economic development in the past centuries in a simple and clear manner. Why is the level of development of countries different? Why is our country Ethiopia poor? What is the way out of poverty and backwardness? It indicates answers and solutions to such questions. It examines various ideological views and economic policies that have been implemented or tried to be implemented in our country. It draws out the problems that have been seen in theory and in practice

title: ዐፄ ቴዎድሮስ እና የኢትዮጵያ አንድነት
author: ተክለጻዲክ መኩሪአ
description: To properly narrate the history of Emperor Theodore's era; Sometimes with a back story; Other times, it requires commenting and relating to the situation that followed. It is appropriate to relate the circumstances outside the region where actions were taken. In Mr. Tekletsadik Mekuria's book, presented with the broad title of "Emperor Theodore and the Unity of Ethiopia"; In addition to the provinces of the north and the middle of the country where the modern princes fought, and Theodore's power reached; It is appropriate to relate the situation in other parts of Ethiopia from a historical point of view. A person who reads the book without realizing this will ask, "Is this all we call Ethiopia?" It can be confusing. If the princes and kings of that time did not consider the character of the time, what history and culture they brought with them; Readers of today's generation may be confused. Marriage has been a major political tool in feudal Ethiopia until modern times. In the days of princes, who married whom; Who was born and bred from whom; Mr. Tekletsadik Mekuria wrote in detail. In general, it is important to understand the issue of marriage, priesthood, and genealogy from its political meaning in relation to the purpose of controlling one another and gaining supremacy.

title: የዓለም ታሪክ ፩ኛ መጽሐፍ
author: ከበደ ሚካእል
description: Kebede Michael is one of the early writers in the history of Ethiopian literature. The poet was born on October 23, 1909. After completing his education in the church, he attended modern education at the Alliance Franchise and Caesarist Mission. Greek Romans, English, French; German After examining many Russian and Italian books, they donated twenty-six books to their people. When Addis Ababa University awarded him an honorary doctorate in 1990; "The expressions, words, metaphors and other aspects of writing style of the great author of Anih, which appear in his works, are not easy to contribute to the later authors. Many authors, especially since the 1950s, have read his essays. Through his essays, they became authors by knowing and experiencing literature.

title: ፍቅር ወደ ጥላቻ የአደረገው ጉዞ
author: ዲአኮን ዳኔል ኪብረት
description: The story of Joseph is the only story of one person that covers a long space in the five books of Moses (Genesis, Exodus, Leviticus, Numbers, and Deuteronomy). The great fathers we know in the Bible are Adam, Enoch, Abraham; Isaac and Jacob do not have as much personal history in the Torah books as Joseph. why? That is the question. Moses is the leader of Israel after Joseph. Israel was hurt by Joseph's death. The kings who arose after his death were not good for Israel. Because of this, the story of Joseph was a comfort to the Israelites. Moses grew up not studying this history. On the other hand, Joseph studied the history of Israel

title: ራስን የመለወጥ መንገድ
author: እጭክሀርት ቶልለ ትራንስላተድ ብይ ቢኒአም አለማየሁ
author_romanized: Eckhart Tolle Translated by Biniam Alemayehu
description: In his book "The Power of Now", Eckhart Tolle made his readers understand that it is possible to be happy in the present. It shows clearly. Get ready for the lifeline where you will find better things. In this age full of rush, we all think more than we should, we want more than we need to enjoy, and, in the middle, we forget that we should enjoy the journey. We worry about what people think of us, we compare ourselves to others and as a result we feel that we are "not good enough". Eckhart Tolle gives you the confidence to overcome your inner fears. After reading this book, you will stop criticizing your life and start living with freedom and clarity. You will end up wasting your whole life in search of happiness; Instead, you look inward, realizing that happiness is something you have to experience now. Discover your true self and lead your life in a better way. Don't go back to where you were before.

author: ድር ሮዳስ ታደስሰ
description: The great goal of education is first self-knowledge, then with knowledge and wisdom, to distinguish falsehood from truth, light from darkness, to serve the country with sincerity and truth, not just to enter a training institution and wear a graduation gown and receive a certificate. Therefore, when you learn to understand the great wisdom and heavenly secrets of this alphabet, which is the treasure of all Ethiopians for thousands of years, then you will learn to love, respect, and protect your alphabet.

title: መሪዎች ለምን ይዋሻሉ?
author: ፕሮፈስሶር ጆህን መአርሸኢመር ትራንስላተድ ብይ ሶሎሞን ብ
author_romanized: Professor John Mearsheimer translated by Solomon B
description: A lie leader destroys his own credibility more than anyone else. It is not the choice of any country to work with corrupt leaders and their diplomats. In particular, if the countries that have brought the countries to negotiate are simple political issues, it is easy to agree by not using lies, and using unnecessary lies as a negotiation strategy will create mistrust between the countries and it will be impossible to reach an agreement. The resulting distrust will become a major obstacle for the future relations between the countries. A lie leader not only his own; It spoils the whole political and social picture of the country. It makes the country not only distrustful but despised by other countries. It should be known that the lies of the leaders on domestic political issues can have consequences that go beyond being considered disgraceful and can even shorten the life of the regime. If the country's leaders are more liars, the people of the country may follow the leaders and adopt lying as a culture. If this is the case, it means that the bureaucracy will be invaded by a system full of lies and corruption.

title: ምሥጢረ ሦስት ልሣነ ክርስቶስ
author: ፓኡሎስ መልካ ሰልላስሴ
description: በቤተ ክርስቲያን ውስጥ በከበረ ልጅነትና በሚደነቅ የወንጌል አገልግሎት የምናውቀው መምህር ጳውሎስ መልክዓ ሥላሴ ከቤተ ክርስቲያን ጥበብ የተቀዳ ይኽን ምሥጢረ ሦስት የተሰኘ መጽሐፍ ይዞልን ሲመጣ አንባብያን የምንማርበት ቁምነገር ብዙ ነው።

title: ንህነ
author: ተመስገን መለሰ
description: This book is not to be poured out, but to fill in what is missing, to look at the unseen, to bear witness to the unseen, to remember the forgotten, to celebrate what we have done, to protect identity, to be proud of ourselves, to pass on good values to the next generation, to reveal what is hidden, to clear the confusion, to use indigenous wisdom and knowledge, to be proud of culture and identity, for oneself and indigenous knowledge.

title: የሻማ ብርሃን 2
author: ከፈለንግ ዘለላው
description: እኔ ግን ትልቁ የሚኖረኝ ከትንሹ መነሳት ስችል እንደሆነ አምናለሁ።፡ አምፔም እኖራለሁ፡፡ በመኖሬም እነሆ

title: የፕሮጄክት አመራር
author: ተስፋየ ነዋይ
description: In recent times, government and private institutions that do not use projects have become less and less, so the science and art of project management is becoming necessary in all sectors, especially in the justice system, construction, chemical industry, information system, health, consulting services, banking, infrastructure construction and various professions. The responsibility of a project leader is a fraught and heavy job. That is why a project leader is said to be a leader who solves conflicts. While it is expected to be tiring, the joy and honor that comes with the successful completion of the project makes the work desirable and exciting. As the work is very conflictual, a person who wants to participate and be successful in this profession must not shy away from conflicts and be prepared to accept risks. A good project leader can be someone who has the skills and ability to resolve conflicts, anticipate changes in threats, and is ready to use them for project success.

title: የመጽሐፍ ቅዱስ ስሞች
author: ማርኮስ ደስታ
description: This book is a dictionary prepared with the meanings of the names of God, names of the Lord Jesus, holy angels, prophets, apostles, biblical people, places, and other biblical names, along with explanations and references. More than 2,500 names were presented, and it was possible to show that most of the names are named after Ethiopian languages and Ethiopians by searching for the root word of the names. For this, a look at the following examples will make the matter clear.

title: የሚድያና ሕዝብ ግንኙነት አሠራር
author: መኮንነን ተካ
description: Knowing how to work with media and public relations is not a luxury for the modern man, but it is becoming one of the obligations of life. The status and influence of individuals, institutions, organizations and even countries are being classified by the quality and depth of their information, The rich and the poor, the wise and the ignorant. This form of the modern world is defined by the knowledge and level of analysis of media and communication. Thus, the content of this book will help us to row to these global powers and become victorious. Whether it is theoretical or practical, the use of media and public-relations practice is significant for our transition from daily individual consumption to global production. Therefore, after reading it, you will undoubtedly witness that the legacy of examining the content of this book so that we can break the limits of profession, emotion, philosophy, and interest and become influential.

title: የመጨረሻዋ ዕለት
author: አብረሀም በውከት ታረከንግ
description: Let no one enter who does not know the way out. And for those who know the way out, the entrance is not difficult. Our country is in the midst of crisis and her children are jumping into it without knowing their way out. Anyway, I wrote these poems based on my various encounters since 1996. Of course, I have included a few poems that I have written in recent years that were not in the first edition. The first edition did not reach many readers due to the lack of printing numbers and various reasons. Many readers have given me enough feedback and encouraged me. Their comments have enabled me to collect and publish my poems in the future. This book focus on social, political and economic issues.

title: የአመራር ክህሎት
author: ተስፋየ ነዋይ
description: The author, Tesfaye Neway, has presented us with a wonderful educational book on the importance and function of leadership. Leadership is both an art and a science. Fully possessing and implementing leadership skills is a matter that will move the institution, country and people to a better level. The leadership skills indicated in this book, the implications of leadership in terms of building an institutional culture, have been sufficiently analyzed in terms of contemporary international knowledge. I benefited a lot from reading this book. Therefore, I recommend that leaders and future leaders should read this golden and timeless book. Dear Ato Tesfaye, I would like to thank you for using your time in a proper way to contribute this book and keep it up. Ambassador Degfe Bula: The Director General of the Federal Justice Law Institute in the rank of Minister

title: ሸግዬ ሸጊቱ
author: ሚካእል አስቸናኪ
description: The book is an essay on social, political and philosophical issues accompanied by fun and beautiful stories.

title: ከፍሪስኮ ዱባይ
author: መንጊስቱ መርሀጺኦን
description: A sweet novel about a couple's love and social life. It explores the intricacies of human behavior, the depths of the heart. It explores a little about the philosophy of religion and faith. It tests the thirst for revenge, the power of love, and the tyranny of money. The story starts from San Francisco, touches Ethiopia and ends in Dubai. It is a novel presented in simple presentation, graphic expression.

title: ሕግና አተረጓጎሙ
author: ተስፋየ ነዋይ
description: Since law is a very respected profession, it is a very important profession to ensure the rights and freedoms of people and make the social life fair so that the rule of law reigns. I believe that judges, prosecutors, legal scholars and other professionals in the profession will gain sufficient understanding of the principles and practical implications of the legal interpretation concepts found in this book. Dear Ato Tesfaye, I strongly believe that the way you have analyzed the interpretation of the law, especially in relation to judicial work, is very important, and I have full faith that you will prepare a better book in the future. --- Ato Solomon Areda---Vice President of the Federal Supreme Court

title: ፍቅርና ማዕረግ
author: ሰብለ ዪርጋ
description: This author's first book has tried to examine the psychological and social problems of women living in the country and the city. In general, she makes us laugh with her social observation and the current situation of our country. In view of these issues, I would like to suggest that this article should be read by women, men, scholars, educators, students, teachers, soldiers, etc.

title: አመራርና ተጠያቂነት
author: አለሙ አማረ
description: Social, political and economic conditions in a country inevitably affect all citizens. The systematic response of citizens to this event individually and as a group is also their civic duty. Although this book is not the primary purpose of exploring the wide range of theories regarding accountability, it includes perspectives and theories that reflect global thoughts in terms of leadership and accountability.

title: አገልፋኖ
author: ከፈለንግ ዘለላው
description: "Agelfano" is presented by combining our national tales and stories with messages; This is my second book in which the developed themes are organized in a concise structure and presented to the dear readers. --- Author’s message---

title: የስልጣኔ አየር
author: ከበደ ሚካእል
description: Kebede Michael is one of the most important authors in the history of Ethiopian literature. He was born on November 2, 1916. The born poet, after completing his ecclesiastical education, attended modern education at the Alliance Franchise and the Tsarist Mission. Greek Romans, English, French; of Germany After examining many Russian and Italian books, they donated twenty-six books to their people. When Addis Ababa University awarded him an honorary doctorate in 1998; "The expressions, words, metaphors and other aspects of the writing style of the great author of Anih, which appear in his essays, are not easy to contribute to the later authors. Many authors, especially since the 1960s, have read his essays. Through his essays, they became authors by knowing and experiencing literature.

title: የ፭ ግጥም እድሜ
author: በዲሉ ዋክጂራ
description: Famous Ethiopian author, Bedilu Wakjira's new book

title: ሞቱን ያስበረገጉ ጀግኖች
author: ጫፒታን አላዘር አያለው
description: ኢትዮጵያ ሀገሩ ክብሯ ተደፍሮ፣እሱ የተገኘበት ማንነት ተንቆና ረክሶ፣የአማራው ህልውና አደጋ ላይ ወድቆ፣ሀገር በከሃዲ ባንዳዎች የመፍረስና የመበታተን አደጋ ተጋርጦባት፣የመንግስትና የግል ተቋማት ሲወድሙ

title: ዙፋን እና በለስ
author: ዎንዲሙ ሀኢሉ
description: Sheger FM's journalist Wondimu Hailu presented his best poetry book

title: የሞተ እርዳታ
author: ሲማቸው ተበጀ
description: የምንኖረው በእርዳታ ባህል ማዕቀፍ ሲሆን ምናልባትም ባለጸጎች ለድሆች የሚሰጡት አእምሯዊና የገንዘብ ምጽት እንደ ትክክለኛ ተግባር እየተቆጠረ መጥቷል፡፡ ባለፉት 50 ዓመታት 1 ትሪሊየን የአሜሪካን ዶላር ልማት ተኮር እርጥባን ከቱጃር ሀገራት ወደ አፍሪካ ተልኳል፡፡

title: የሞት ነጋዴው
author: መሳፊንት ተፈራ
description: ወጎቻችን ከተረቶቻችን የተለዩ ናቸው። ያለና የነበረ ነገር ነው የሚነሣው፤ ታሪኩ ወይም ገጠመኙ የሚታወቅና የሚታመን ነው። ነገር ግን ነገር እንደ ተራኪው፣ ወጥ እንደሠሪው ነው ይባላል።

title: ሰው መሆን
author: አበበ አምባው
description: ሰው መሆን መፅሐፍ በደራሲው በተፈጠረች ከትንሿ የገጠር ከተማ ተነስቶ ማህበራዊ ህይወትን፣ ባህላዊ እሴትን የባህል ልዩነትንና አንዱ በአንዱ ላይ የሚያመጣውን ተፅዕኖ፣ ጣፋጭ የልጅነት ጓደኝነትን፣ እናቶች ለልጆቻቸው የሚከፍሉትን መስዋዕትነት፣

title: ምኞት
author: እምናዊት ሀብታሙ
description: I am a part of the community and I have grown up sharing its joys and tears. Beyond sharing, what separates me from some of my sisters is that I express my feelings in a poetic way where truth, life and beauty are relaxed.

title: መንገደኛው ባለቅኔ
author: ተስፋየ አየለ
description: ከድር ሰተቴ ለሀቅ መኖርን ያስተማረኝ ስለሀቅ ኖሮ ያለፈ ተራማጅ ነው። ክፉ ዘመን ሀቅን እንዳልናገር አንደበቴን በለጎመኝ ወቅት አፍ የሆነኝ ባለውለታዬም ነው።

title: ቀለምና ውበት
author: ሄለን ፋንታሁን
description: የአንድ ሰው አዋቂነት የሚገለጠው በቀለም ገፅ ውስጥ ነው። ቀለም ቆጥሯል አልያም ተምሯል እንላለን።

title: እርካታ
author: እሊያስ ማሞ
description: ይህ እርካታ የተሰኘ መጽሐፍ የውቤ ከረሜላና የጉጉት መጽሐፎች ተከታይ 3ኛ እና የመጨረሻ ክፍል ቢሆንም በራሱ እና ለብቻው መነበብ የሚችል ነው።

title: በመንገዴ ላይ
author: ደሳለንግ ማሳረ
description: The author's account of his parents, childhood, school and university days and the challenges he faced trying to find work after college and later life as a writer, teacher and journalist.

title: ከማዕዘኑ ወዲህ
author: ዳግማዊ አሰፍፋ
description: ሰዎች ውበታቸውን ለመጠበቅ ወጪ እንደሚያወጡት ሁሉ የልባቸው ውበትና ጤንነት ይጠበቅ ዘንድ ይቅርታ ያስፈልጋቸዋል። ይህንን ሀቅ በዚህ መጽሀፍ ውስጥ አግኝቻለሁ።

title: ሥራ አዳኙ
author: ሙክታሮቪች ኦኡስማኖቫ
description: ከሥራ ፈላጊነት ወደ ሥራ የሚሸጋገሩበት ሳይንሳዊ ጥበብ በሙክታሮቪች ኡስማኖቫ

title: ወደ ኢትዮጵያ ሰዎች
author: ሄኖክ ሰዮኡም
description: የምትሰሙትን ደግሞ እንዲሚጮኽ፣ የምታምኑትን እንደሚክድ፣ የምትፈልጉት እንኳን ቢኾን እንደማይፈልግ፤ ደግሞ ፍላጎታችን ከገጠመ ደስ እንደሚለው መናኝ ነፍስ ጥሪ አስቡልኝ፡፡ ለኢትዮጵያ ሰዎች የተጻፈ ነው፡፡

title: ትውስብ
author: አበራ ለማ
description: የሳንሱር ጫና ከሚበረታባቸው ከዋነኞቹ ደራሲያን መካከል ነበሩ። ሩዶልፍ ኬ ሞርቪየር በጥቋቁር አናብስት ስራው ተራማጅ እና አዲስ ስልትን ለመፍጠር ከጣሩ ውስጥ ይመድባቸዋል።

title: 21 ችግሮ 21 ምክሮች
author: ተስፋጺኦን ጋሻነህ
description: አሸባሪዎች የአእምሮ ቁጥጥር ባለሞያዎች ናቸው፡፡ የሚገድሉት ትንሽ ሰዎችን ነው፡፡ ነገር ግን ቢሊዮኖችን የማሸበርና እንደ አሜሪካና አውሮፓ ህብረት ያሉ ትላልቅ የፖለቲካ መዋቅሮችን ያነቃንቃሉ፡፡ ከመስከረም 2001 ጀምሮ ባሉት አመታት ሽብርተኞች በአውሮፓ ህብረት 50 ሰዎችን፣ በአሜሪካ 10 ሰዎችንና በሌሎች ሃገራት በአጠቃላይ (በዋናነት በኢራቅ፣ በአፍጋኒስታን፣ በፓኪስታን፣ በናይጄሪያና በሶሪያ) በአማካይ በአመት 5000 ሰዎችን ገድለዋል፡፡

title: ካህኑ መልከ ጼዴቅ
author: ነጉስ ሰላም ወጻዲክ
description: ከታሪኩ ሠረቀ ፀሐይ ይህ መጽሐፍ የኢትዮጵያን ቤተክህነቱን ቤተመንግሥቱን የተቆጣጠረውን የሐሰት ንግርት በሚገባ የሚያብራራ ድንቅ መጽሐፍ ነው።

title: ከሣቴ ምሥጢር
author: አባ ሀይለመለኮት
description: ለቆሙለት ዓላማ እንደ መኖር አስደሳች ነገር የለም።ብዙ ሰው የሚማረው ከልኩ በማያልፈው ኑሮ አንዳች ነገር ሹመት ወይም ሀብት ለመጨመር ሊሆን ይችላል

title: "የኢትዮጵያ ፍልስፍና" ታሪክ፣ ሃይማኖት፣ ፍልስፍና፣ሀገራዊ ቁጭት የተዋኻዱበት
title_romanized: "yaʼityop̣yā flsfnā" tārik፣ hāymānot፣ flsfnā፣hagarāwi quċt yatawāxādubat

description: Monastic life had been an existential problem for millennia for Ethiopians. “ለቅዱስ ያሬድ ይህ ዓለም በመላ ልክ እንደ አንድ ትልቅ ማሀሌት (ሲንፎኒ)ነው፤ፍጥረታት ሁሉ በአንድነት በዜማ የሚያመሰግኑበት ሲንፎኒ።

title: ለውጥ
author: በድሩ ሁስሴን
description: ለሁሉም የሰው ዘር እኩል ይቆማል። እናም ከተበደሉት ሁሉ ጎን ቁም፤ ይህ የሰውነትህ ክብር ነው።

description: ምርጥ የአማርኛ ግጥም መጽሓፍ በ አስታወሰኝ ረጋሳ ቀርቦላቿል።

title: ሄፍዚባ

description: “በሐሳብ ውስጥ ፍላጎት በፍላጎት ውስጥ ሀሳብ አለ”
